texts.en: Maia is 29 years old and lives in Senaki district with her pensioner father. Despite having a higher education degree, Maia is unemployed at the moment. The region has a high unemployment rate, but self-employment helps inhabitants to make a living. So, Maia decided to start a clothing business with a loan. But the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from the borrowers. Maia’s credit requests were rejected several times for not satisfying lenders' requirements. She received this credit in the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The so-called startup program gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses.  With the loan of 1,000 GEL, she will purchase clothing at wholesale prices to sell retail in her community door-to-door. She plans to sell a wide assortment of well-priced clothing for men, women and children.  It is obvious that the job is hard for Maia, but she is ready to deal with the difficulties to develop her trading business gradually.

loans.use: to begin a business selling clothes.

loans.name: Amriyeh

texts.en: Amriyeh is a 57-year-old Lebanese married mother of four children. In 2012, to help her husband cover the high costs of living, she decided to start working on her own selling perfume from her house to multiple neighboring customers. Yet, her occupation is barely generating a satisfactory income. That’s why she has a real need to borrow from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase a large quantity of perfume that will generate profits. Amriyeh is very thankful for Kiva lenders even before receiving the funds. She is confident that the loan will result is quite enough income for her.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of perfumes

loans.name: Abel De Jesus

texts.es: Abel de 38 años de edad es un hombre emprendedor que se dedica a vender comales y ollas de barro, lo cual realiza en su vehículo de forma ambulante por diferentes puntos de todo el país, el vende los productos por mayor y cuando no tiene pedidos se desplaza a los mercados para vender por detalle manteniendo la estabilidad económica de su familia. Abel trabaja con productos en consignación ya que gracias a su amplia experiencia y que se ha dado a conocer como un hombre íntegro sus proveedores le dan los productos  y el los cancela cuando los vende, pero él desea realizar una inversión que le permita explorar otros mercados con sus productos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: comales, ollas y otros productos de barro que desea promocionar en más lugares del país.
texts.en:
Abel, age 38, is an enterprising man who works selling comals (traditional griddles) and clay pots.  He does this from his vehicle, working as a mobile salesman throughout different parts of the entire country.  He sells his products in bulk and when he doesn’t have orders he heads to the markets to sell them retail, maintaining the financial stability of his family.  

Abel works by consignment because, thanks to his extensive experience, he has come to be known as a trustworthy man.  His suppliers give him their products and he pays off the debt when he sells them, but he wants to make an investment that would allow him to explore other markets with his products.  Because of this, he is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in comals, pots, and other clay products that he wants to promote in additional areas of the country.

loans.use: to invest in comals, pots, and other clay products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase grass for the goats.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
Maria es una joven de 21 años con gran energía y vitalidad.

Es soltera y ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para salir adelante.
Ella tiene una pequeña chaza en la que vende frituras, golosinas y refrescos. 

Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 3:00 Pm para tener sus productos listos y frescos para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.

Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y tener un gran avance de insumos e inventario de productos, por eso acude a un préstamo para comprar surtido de bebidas y frituras. 

Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Maria, 21, is single.  She has had to work for most of her young life and is now a dynamic, enthusiastic entrepreneur.  She owns a mini-market where she sells snacks and cold drinks.  She works from 5:00am to 3:00pm every day and says that she draws the majority of her customers from the neighborhood.

Maria wants to grow her business and is applying for a loan that she will use to buy snacks and soft drinks for resale.  Finding money for expanding her business is one of the biggest challenges that Maria faces and she is counting on support from Corporación Interactuar and the goodwill of Kiva lenders to help her breach the gap and grow her business.

loans.use: to stock her mini-market.

loans.name: Rosvette

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Rosvette works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a variety store.  Rosvette is borrowing PHP 24,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Rosvette has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Oscar Andres

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre muy trabajador y organizado, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de transporte de personas e su moto-taxi a través de las veredas del municipio de Norcasia posibilitando el desplazamiento de la comunidad hasta las distintitas áreas del municipio.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es casado y sostiene a su esposa a la cual siempre ha procurado ofrecerle la mejor vida posible.

Solicita un préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento y reparación a su moto-taxi ya que es su único medio de trabajo.

Con este crédito podrá mejorar las condiciones de su vehículo y podrá continuar prestando su servicio con total seguridad y sin poner en riesgo su vida ni la de sus clientes.

Apoya a Oscar con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Oscar is an organized, hard-working man.  He owns a taxi business, ferrying passengers around the town of Norcasia in his moto-taxi.  He is a friendly guy, customer-oriented and very enterprising.  He is married and always done his best to build a good life for himself and his wife.

Oscar is applying for a loan that he will use to repair and maintain his moto-taxi.  His taxi business is his only source of income and the investment will allow him to carry on the business and provide a safe and comfortable service for his passengers.

Please support Oscar's efforts to maintain and grow his business!

loans.use: to repair and maintain his moto-taxi.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 34-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. For many years, her husband has owned an enterprise of stitching and selling embroidered dresses by machine in his nearby town. 

He wants to meet the demand for bridal dresses. That is why he wants to buy stock of threads, fancy cloth, sequins, and pearls of various colors in advance. For this purpose he requires some capital to buy desired inventories, but he does not have sufficient cash on hand. Therefore, Nasreen made this humble request to BRAC Pakistan for a loan. Through this loan, her husband would be able to buy stock of threads, fancy cloth, sequins, and pearls of various colors. 

She is very glad and thankful to BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy raw material for her husband's embroidery work

loans.name: Mayra Lizeth

texts.es: Mayra, tiene 23 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene un hijo y reside en el municipio de el Negrito,  Yoro junto a su hijo, su  madre y su padre. Ella trabajó un tiempo en un supermercado y al quedar sin empleo hace un año y medio decidió por establecer su propio negocio de una pulpería invirtiendo sus prestaciones sociales y un préstamo para iniciar la venta de productos alimenticios como ser arroz, azúcar, refrescos, manteca, huevos, café, pan, verduras, condimentos, productos de limpieza, jugos, pastas etc. Antes del negocio obtuvo tres préstamo para utilizarlos en su casa. El negocio ha seguido en crecimiento y actualmente solicita otro préstamo por 25,000 lempiras para surtir con productos como pollo, embutidos, refrescos, jugos, azúcar, café, arroz, y manteca para aprovechar la temporada y vender más. Su meta es hacer crecer el negocio y que sea su fuente de ingresos para brindarle educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Mayra, age 23, is a single mother.  She has a child and lives in the town of Negrito, Yoro, together with her child, her mother, and her father.  

She worked for a time in a supermarket. When she became unemployed a year and a half ago she decided to set up her own business—a small grocery store.  She invested her benefits and a loan in order to begin selling foodstuffs such as rice, sugar, drinks, lard, eggs, coffee, bread, vegetables, seasonings, cleaning products, juice, pasta, etc.  Before her business began, she took out three loans to use for her house.  

Her business has kept growing and currently she is asking for a loan of 25,000 lempiras to stock it with products such as chicken, cold cuts, drinks, juice, sugar, coffee, rice, and lard in order to take advantage of the season and sell more.  Her goal is to make her business grow and that it would be a source of income to give her child an education.

loans.use: to stock up with products such as chicken, cold cuts, drinks, juice, sugar, coffee, rice, and lard in order to take advantage of the season and sell more.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal AMAUTA, la socia Josefina tiene 48 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos balanceados para animales como afrecho, conejina entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de afrecho entre otros.
La socia se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, Josefina, belongs to Amauta Communal Bank.  She's 48 years old and single, and she has two children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling balanced feed for animals, including bran and rabbit feed.  She has had this business for some time and it's going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She wants to be able to keep on working so she can support her family.

Josefina requested the loan to buy bran and other products.

She promises to make her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy bran and other products

loans.name: Von's Group

texts.en: Von’s Group lives in a rural village in Battambang Province in Cambodia. Von works as a farmer to support her family. In her village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem is a 41-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She has three sons and two daughters, and her children are doing study. Her husband has been running his own clothes selling business for three years, and he is only responsible to feed the entire family and manage the household. He needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purposes, but due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to purchase these clothes.

Therefore, Tasleem is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan, so that she can assist her husband in purchasing these clothes in bulk for his business. He can also increase the size of his business and earn maximum profit with the help of this loan amount. Tasleem is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for the clothes selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moises de 71 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado desde hace 25 años, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, Moisés esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ganado para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Moises is 71 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has been raising cattle for 25 years.  With what he gets from his sales he manages to pay some of his household expenses. Moíses is requesting a loan so that he can buy more cattle, continue with this work and have a better income.

loans.use: To buy more cattle.

loans.name: La Responsabilidad Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Responsabilidad es integrado por cuatro personas emprendedoras, quien es coordinado por Deura una mujer laboriosa de 47 años de edad, soltera, se dedica a la venta de platanitos y enchiladas, comercializándolas en el mercado de la municipalidad, decidió impulsar este negocio hace treinta dos años primeramente con dinero que tenía ahorrado, luego con los financiamientos realizados logró comprar matas de plátanos al por mayor, canastas y un estante a, este crédito lo solicita para la compra de matas de plátanos en grandes cantidades. Al equipo de trabajo de esta socia lo integran Concepción de 34 años de edad propietaria de una venta de ropa nueva, Juan tiene la edad de 23 años y se dedica  la venta de ropa nueva, y Yaoska  tiene la edad de 28 años y se dedica a la venta de ropa y café caliente en las calles de la municipalidad.
texts.en:
The Responsabilidad communal bank is made up of four enterprising persons and coordinated by Deura, a hard-working woman of 47, single, who sells  fried plantain snacks and enchiladas in the market of the municipality. She decided to launch this business 320 years ago, primarily with money she had saved. Then, with the profits she realized, managed to buy plantain plants at wholesale, baskets and a stand. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy plantain plants in large quantities. 

Concepción, 34, also belongs to to this group, and has a business selling new clothing. Juan is 22 years old and sells new clothing. Yaoska is 23 and sells clothing and hot coffee in the streets of the municipality.

loans.use: To buy plantain plants  in large quantities and succeed in increasing sales.

loans.name: Elsa Violeta

texts.es:
Elsa Violeta tiene 45 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en el distrito de Nueva Arica, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña y frutales, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral como patos, gallinas y pavos, su negocio esta ubicado en la parte posterior a su domicilio, con los ingresos que recibe contribuye con los gastos familiares. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de alimento balanceado para tener una mejor producción en su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia, lo que aumentará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elsa Violeta is 45 years old and married. She lives with her spouse and their children in the district of Nueva Arica. The district is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru. The population there works growing sugarcane and fruit trees. 

Elsa Violeta works raising poultry, such as ducks, chickens and turkeys. Her business is located at the back of her home. She uses her earnings to contribute to her household's expenses. Elsa has requested a loan to purchase balanced feed in order to increase her business' production. In this way she will generate better earnings for her family, which will increase their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed to increase her business' production.

loans.name: Allah Rakhi

texts.en:
Allah Rakhi is 37 years old and lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a shoe shop, in which he sells a variety of shoes. He buys shoes from different shoe manufacturers and sells from his shop. He has been selling gents shoes only, but now he wants to offer ladies shoes as well, according to customer's demand. The major problem is the lack of lump sum amount. 

Therefore, Allah Rakhi has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, so her husband would be able to buy ladies shoes as well. Allah Rakhi is very happy after taking this loan and thanks Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy ladies shoes for her husband's shoes sale shop business

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is 49 years old and has eight children. She lives in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She owns a beauty parlor, where she is an expert in makeover services. Most of her clients reside in the neighborhood and her clients appreciate her services. With the passage of time, her beauty products have been diminishing, and this time she wants to buy more beauty products for her beauty salon. 

Shamim requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, which she will use to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, lotion, etc. She wants to establish a parlor in the main market of the town, to enhance her income.

loans.use: to buy new cosmetics products such as facial cream, bleach cream, nail polish, hair color, lotion, etc. for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is from Puntod, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is 63 years old and is married. In May of 2012, Susana for applied her membership with PMPC.  Hearing all the benefits, she never hesitated to become a member. She maintains the status of being a member in good standing and repays her obligations in a timely manner. 

Recently, Susana asked for financial assistance of PHP 15,000 to restock store inventories, to increase her sales and be able to generate additional income. Through this, she hopes to increase her income and be of help in the expansion of her business. She has found assistance for their financial needs through Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and she is very thankful with all her heart. Susana wishes nothing more than to live a happy and healthy life.

loans.use: to restock store inventories to increase her sales and be able to generate additional income

loans.name: Tania

texts.en: Tania is a 26-year-old mother with five children. She runs and operates a small plantation in her village to earn a living. Tania has requested a loan to buy taro roots, banana tube, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, safety boots, and hand gloves to help her run the business. She has been doing this for more than four years to earn a living. Tania hopes to use the profit to expand her business in the near future and provide for her family's daily needs. She became a member of SPBD in 2011.

loans.use: to buy taro roots, banana tube, chemicals, a wheelbarrow, rake, shovel, water tank, safety boots, and hand gloves

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicándose a  su negocio de molinera, él tiene una empresa donde muele granos de trigo, cebadas y habas, el socio lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, él socio a la vez continua con su negocio de fereteria,el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 El socio requiere el préstamo para comprar granos entre otros.
 El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
Este préstamo es parte de una de las líneas de crédito de la Asociación Arariwa su nombre es Credi Yapa, esta línea de crédito es otorgado a los prestatarios con buen historial crediticio.
texts.en:
The member continues making a living with his milling business. He has a company where he grinds wheat grains, barley, and beans. The member has had his business for quite some time, which has success thanks to the effort that he puts into it every day. At the same time, he continues with the hardware store business. The member hopes to be able to keep working, and in this way, be able to keep supporting his family. 
The member needs the loan to buy grains, among others. 
The member is grateful for the opportunity provided through this medium, and he is committed to meeting the corresponding payments on schedule. 
This loan is part of one of the credit lines of Asociación Arariwa, its name is Credi Yapa. This credit line is awarded to borrowers with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy grains for milling.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 48 years old and single.

Helen works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Helen has been in this business for seven years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Helen aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Nagina

texts.en:
Nagina is a 28-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of two children. She knits handmade embroidery in her home. Her sister-in-law also helps her with the completion of her tasks. Her husband has been running a small business of fiber sales. He buys raw material for his fiberwork and sells its fiber variety to his customers for profit. 

Now he wants to increase his current business, but due to lack of money he finds it difficult. Therefore his wife, Nagina, has requested a loan from Kiva lenders. Nagina hopes that through this Kiva loan, her husband will be able to enhance his fiber business. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To enhance her husband's fiber business.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal AMAUTA, la socia Josefina tiene 48 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos balanceados para animales como afrecho, conejina entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
Este préstamo es parte de una de las líneas de crédito de la Asociación Arariwa su nombre es Credi Yapa, esta línea de crédito es otorgado a los prestatarios con buen historial crediticio.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de afrecho entre otros.
La socia se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Josefina is a member of the AMAUTA communal bank. Josefina is 48 years old, has two children, and is single.  She alternates between her daily activities and her business selling nutritionally balanced products for animals, including bran and rabbit feed. She has had her business for a while, which is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day. She wants to be able to keep working so that she can continue supporting her family.

This loan is part of one of the Arariwa Association’s credit lines, named Credi Yapa. This credit line is granted to borrowers who have a good credit history. This member is requesting the loan to purchase bran, among other things. She is committed to meeting her established payments.

loans.use: to purchase bran, among other things

loans.name: Cristian Medardo

texts.es: Cristian de 30 años de edad vive en casa con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Cristian is 30 years old and lives in a house with his wife and their daughter. For some years he has made a living as a farmer growing maize. He sells his produce in the markets that are found near to his house. 

He is asking for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer, pesticides etc. in order to improve the land (shown in the photograph) so that he can continue farming and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides in order to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more sandals at wholesale.

loans.name: Qorichaska Del Cusco Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “QORICHASKA DEL CUSCO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Anacris ella es conviviente y tiene 27 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia vende pantalones, blusas y polos, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un bazar. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar zapatos, polos, chompas, polos y blusas.
Los socios que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de bazar, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de internet.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members of the Qorichaska del Cusco communal bank live in Cusco district which is part of Cusco province in Cusco department. 

Anacris is 27, lives with her partner, and has one child.. She has a business selling clothing. She sells pants, blouses and T-shirts. She has been in this business for several years already and it is going very well. Her dream is to have a shop. 

She is requesting a loan to buy shoes, T-shirts, sweaters and blouses. The picture attached to the main photo was taken after the meeting because these members asked permission due to to work reasons. The other members have small general stores,  a business selling clothing, a grocery store and an Internet café. The member is grateful to those who form part of this dream by this means,  and promises to make her scheduled installment payments.

loans.use: To buy shoes, T-shirts, sweaters and blouses.

loans.name: Maximiliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE,el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia tiene 48 años de edad es soltera y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus  actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de flores como rosas, margaritas, claveles entre otros, la socia leva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de lirios entre otros.
La socia se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank San Jose, which is located in the province of Cusco.
The member is 48 years old, is single, and has 2 children. The member alternates her daily activities with the sale of flowers, such as roses, daisies, carnations, among others. The member has had her business for quite some time, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  The member hopes to be able to keep working, and in this way, be able to keep supporting her family. 
The member asks for the loan for the purchase of iris flowers, among others.  The member is committed to meeting the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase iris flowers, among others.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SAN JOSE, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Cirila continua con su negocio de venta de flores ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo diferentes tipos de flores como margaritas,calas,rosas entre otros siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de calas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Jose communal bank, the bank is located in Cusco province.

Cirila continues with her florist business, she is a responsible and diligent person, she continues selling different kinds of flowers such as 
daisies, calla lilies, roses, and more, being that this is the way that the member gets her family ahead. 

She asks for a loan to purchase calla lilies among others.

She is grateful for the granted loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to purchase calla lilies among others.

loans.name: Eloy Dalamcio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE”, el socio Eloy tiene  34 años de edad es casado y tiene 02 hijos ,el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a brindar el servicio de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio  el cual el va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de llantas.
 El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Jose communal bank. The member, Eloy, is 34 years old, married, and has 2 children. He spends part of his daily work offering taxi service. He has been in this business for a good while, which is going well thanks to his dedication that he puts into his business every day. The member wants to be able to continue working, so in this way to continue supporting his family.

The member ask for a loan to purchase tires.

He is grateful for the offered opportunity through this platform and also promises to make the payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to purchase tires.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN JOSE”, el socio Carlos tiene  36 años de edad y es soltero ,el socio alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a brindar el servicio de taxi, el socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio  el cual el va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro.
 El socio se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the San Jose communal bank.  The member, Carlos, is 36 years old and single. The member spends part of his daily work offering taxi service. He has been working in this business a good while, which is going well thanks to the dedication that puts into his business every day. He wants to be able to continue working to, in this way, continue supporting his family.

The member asks for a loan to do maintenance on his car.

The member is grateful for the offered opportunity through this platform and also promises to make the payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to make repairs on his car.

loans.name: 95 United Self Help Group

texts.en:
The lady raising her hand in the photo is Margaret. She is thirty years old, married and has three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to benefit from the training on enterprise development.  She does vegetable and dairy farming to earn a living. She is borrowing a loan to boost her vegetable farming by buying certified seeds and manure.  She hopes her crop yield will improve, thus generating more income from improved sales.
Margaret is happy that she will be able to provide better education for her children. She is very happy with Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To buy planting seeds and manure that will help improve crop yield.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria viene de una familia humilde, y trabajadora, se encuentra trabajando como empleada de una peluqueria, y a la vez está estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad.
La aspiración de Maria es poder terminar  su carrera y comenzar a trabajar en forma independiente y ser una profesional muy destacada en su campo.
Pide este prestamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad.
texts.en:
Maria comes from a humble and hardworking family. She works as an employee in a beauty salon, and at the same time is studying in an accounting program.

Maria's aspiration is to be able to finish her program and start to work independently and be an exemplary professional in her field. She asks for this loan to be able to pay university fees.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
Leticia estudia la carrera de ciencias contables para poder mejorar su vida a través del campo laboral ya que es una carrera con muy buena muy demandada actualmente.
Ella vive con sus padres, quienes la ayudan y apoyan siempre en todo lo que ella emprende. Quiere ser alguien en la vida y poder crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma abrirse camino.
texts.en:
Leticia is a student in an accounting program to be able to improve her live through work since it is a degree with high demand currently.

She lives with her parents, who help her and always support her in everything she undertakes. She wants to be someone in her life and be able to grow. 

She asks for this loan to be able to pay the program fees, and in this way open paths for herself.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Derlis

texts.es:
Derlis es un joven que trabaja y a la vez estudia, es una persona que quiere salir adelante y crecer por medio de sus estudios.
Está estudiando para poder ser un buen abogado, y por medio de sus estudios poder ir abriéndose camino para poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Derlis is a young man who works and studies at the same time. He is a person who wants to get ahead and grow through his studies.

He is studying to be able to be a good lawyer, and through his studies be able to make his way to be able to help other people.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay the program fees, and in this way, be able to continue growing as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Victor está trabajando en una financiera y también está estudiando la carrera de administración agropecuaria, se esta esforzando para poder ser alguien en la vida y sobresalir.
Quiere poder ser un profesional exitoso que sea de ayuda, no solo para si mismo, sino también para los demás. 
pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera y seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Victor is working in a finance company and is also studying in the agricultural administration program. He is working hard to be able to be someone in his live and to improve himself.

He wants to be a successful professional who is a help, not only to himself, but also to others.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay the program fees and continue with his studies as he has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, vive con sus padres, y comenta que ellos siempre la apoyan en sus proyectos, por lo que ella está muy agradecida.
Está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, lo que le permitirá ser un gran profesional, que ayuda a las demás personas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de titulación, y de esa forma cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en:
Hilda is from the city of Paraguarí, lives with her parents, and says that they always help her with her projects, for which she is very grateful.

She is studying in the accounting program, which will allow her to be a good professional, who helps other people. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting to be able to be someone in her life.

She asks for this loan to be able to cover the costs of her degree, and in this way pay this expense that she has.

loans.use: to pay the costs for the degree.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra.  Maria tiene 62 años, es  madre de 3 hijos, proviene de una familia de comerciantes y agricultores  de  dicha  ciudad.
Se independizo en el año 2000  montando su propio negocio de una despensa y carnicería, desde la apertura de su negocio le va muy bien. Su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales, y puedan ser útiles a la sociedad.
Esta muy agradecida por la oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda. Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su despensa con productos varios, lo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Maria is 62 years old, she is the mother of three children, and she comes from a family of retailers and farmers. 
She became independent in the year 2000, starting her own business of a grocery store and meat shop. Since the opening of her store, it has been going well. Her biggest dream is that her children become professionals, and can be useful for society. She is very grateful for the opportunity she receives, which will be very helpful. She asks for this loan to be able to supply her store with several products, which will be very helpful.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of supplies for her grocery store.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 40 years old and married. Roselyn works very hard to provide for her family.

Roselyn runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell, like sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc.

Roselyn has been in this business for three years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell, like sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Always supportive of her family, Sakina, 45 and a mother of four, makes sure that she is always there for her family. She is a strong and determined person. One of her children is a rickshaw driver and drives a rented rickshaw. To help her son be independent and self sufficient she has requested a loan to buy a new rickshaw for her son. She is hopeful that her investment will pay off and her son will succeed in life. She is thankful to BRAC Pakistan and Kiva.

loans.use: To buy a new rickshaw for her son

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To enable her husband to buy products to sell in his general store

loans.name: Kuibanga Women Group

texts.en:
The person raising her hand in the photo is Leah. She is thirty years old, married and a mother of three children. Training by Hand in Hand Eastern Africa on enterprise development helped her realize her strength in business.  She is engaged in a full-time business of poultry and vegetable farming. 

She is borrowing a Kiva loan to buy manure for her vegetables. She hopes her crop yield will improve, and thus she will have increased income from improved sales. Leah plans to use the anticipated income to cater for basic needs such as food. She is very happy with Kiva for the help and support.

loans.use: To buy manure that will help improve crop yield, and result in more income that will be used to provide basic needs such as food.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Judith se sigue esforzando por poder terminar su carrera, es una persona muy luchadora, comenta que este es su tercer préstamo con Kiva, y que los anteriores le han sido de mucha ayuda para poder seguir luchando en su sueño de ser un profesional.
Pide de nuevo este préstamo para poder invertir nuevamente en sus cuotas, lo que le permitirá seguir con sus estudios, luchando por sus sueños.
texts.en:
Judith continues working hard to be able to finish her program. She is a very determined person and says that this is her third loan with Kiva, and that the previous ones have been a great help to be able to continue struggling toward her dream of becoming a professional.

She asks again for this loan to be able to invest again in her fees, which will allow her to continue with her studies, fighting for her dreams.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Richar Jony

texts.es: Richar de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica al cultivo de yuca y granos básicos desde hace varios años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados, el esta solicitando nuevamente un crédito para comprar mas controles de plagas, semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, etc. y poder mejorar el terreno, ya que le ha ido muy bien en sus cultivos y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Richar is 35 years old and lives in a house that he owns with his family. He has worked growing yucca and basic grains for many years. He sells his products in various markets. 

Richar is requesting a loan to purchase more pesticides, seeds, fertilizers, and manure, etc., and to be able to improve the land.  His crops have been going very well for him, and this way he will be able to have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase more pesticides, seeds, fertilizers, and manure, etc., and to be able to improve the land.

loans.name: Jeneveve

texts.en: Jeneveve has mastered her hog raising business in Danao, Plaridel, Philippines. This is how she makes a living and is able to help her husband in raising their family. She was at her lowest point when she didn't have enough capital for her business. When she joined PMPC, she was truly grateful to avail herself of credit to fully support her business. Just as how she takes care of her hog raising business, so it is with her membership with PMPC. She wants to maintain her membership in good standing so she can always run for any financing needs. Now, the loan of PHP 7,000 will help her build a concrete pig pen that will support sanitation and care for the environment. In the future, she wants to expand and improve her business by adding pigs for commercial sale and wishes to open a meat shop in the the nearby town.

loans.use: build a concrete pig pen.

loans.name: Elio

texts.es:
El Sr .Elio es una persona emprendedora que trabaja en su propia olería, que con mucho sacrificio pudo montar y sacar adelante, busca siempre crecer como persona y económicamente, para de esa forma poder sostener a su familia.
Elio sueña con poder crecer y seguir siendo el sostén de sus seres queridos. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar arcilla, y de esa forma hacer los ladrillos que vende, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Elio is an enterprising person who works in his own brick kiln, which he has sacrificed a lot to be able to establish and get ahead. He always is looking to grow as a person and economically, so that in this way to be able to support his family. 

Elio dreams of being able to grow and continue being the sustenance for his loved ones. He asks for this loan to be able to purchase clay, and in this way make the bricks that he sells, which will be a great help to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase clay to make bricks.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Jennifer works hard to support her family.

She has a buy-and-sell vegetable business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and a general store. Jennifer is borrowing 20,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell for her buy-and-sell vegetable business.

Jennifer has been sustaining her business activities through her past fifteen loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Ramos

texts.es:
Ramos vive en una comunidad de Solola, es una persona casada de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa 2 niños y 1 una niña, los tres son pequeños todavía. 

Ramos viene desempeñando desde hace 10 años el trabajo de agricultor,  ya que este trabajo fue el que su papá le enseño desde pequeño,  pues por la pobreza en que vivan sus padres él no tuvo la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela y por la misma circunstancia aprendió este trabajo,  Ramos tiene mucha experiencia en la siembra de hortalizas,  es una persona que le gusta mucho trabajar en los terrenos agrícolas,  La meta de él para este año es conseguir seguir sembrando, pero lamentablemente él no cuenta con capital de trabajo para compra de insumos agrícolas, por tal razón Ramos esta en búsqueda de un préstamo para sufragar estos gastos. 

Ramos está luchando para conseguir su préstamo, ya que él quiere sembrar en los meses indicados para obtener buena cosecha, el sueño más grande de Ramos es que mas a futuro pueda comprar un pedazo de terreno para construir su casita.
texts.en:
Ramos is 32 years old and married. He lives in a community of Sololá together with his wife and three children, two boys and a girl who are still young.

He's been a farmer for ten years, this is the work that his father taught him from a young age. Ramos did not have a chance to attend school due to the poverty that his parents lived in.

He has a great deal of experience growing vegetables, and he really likes working the land. His goal for this year is to continue farming, but unfortunely he does not have working capital to purchase agricultural inputs. This is why Ramos is looking for a loan to meet these expenses. 

He's really trying hard to get this loan, because he wants to be sowing during the ideal months to get a good harvest.

The biggest dream for Ramos is to buy a piece of land in the future where he can build his home.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Erika

texts.en:
Erika is a Kubo Financiero’s client and this is her story:

Erika is 32 years old, is married and is the mother of three children, ten, eight and three years old. She makes a living by running a convenience store. Her husband also supports the house by working in the town hall.

Erika has been operating her store for 10 years now. There she sells dairy products, home and school supplies, perfumes and assorted gifts. In order to improve her income she started selling catalog shoes two years ago.

She is asking for this loan to stock her general store, looking forward to increasing her sales and her income.

loans.use: to stock her convenience store and increase her sales.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en: Nida is 51 years old and lives in Puntod, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. Her husband is a farmer. Unable to sustain the needs of the family with only her husband’s income, she has found ways to earn income through her sari-sari (small grocery) store. It began with selling a few inventories of canned goods, noodles, sugar and eggs to their neighbors. She joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her in the capitalization of her sari-sari (small grocery) store in July of 2010. She became a MIGS member, which is why she has received loans several times already. Now, she applies for 20,000 PHP to buy merchandise for her sari-sari store. She hopes that her business will continue and someday become a mini-grocery.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Rustambek

texts.ru: Рустамбек 23 года, холост, детей нет. Рустамбек в качестве основного дохода занимается животноводством и полеводством, также он предоставляет услуги тракториста местному населению. Благодаря упорному труду Рустамбека, на сегодняшний день у него есть 3 коровы, 1 лошадь, 8 овец, также он выращивает на собственном участке мерою 1,0 ГА помидоры, рис, огурцы для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, он обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, семян арбузов, перца и дыни, также клеенки для парника. Рустамбек является участником группы "Рустам", в которой кроме него состоят еще 2 человека. Доходы от кредита Рустамбек планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и постройку сарая для скота.
texts.en:
Rustambek is 23 years old, single, and does not have children. As a main source of income, Rustambek raises livestock and crops, and also provides services a tractor driver to the local population. Thanks to the hard work of Rustambek, he currently has three cows, one horse, and eight sheep, and also he grows on his own plot of landing measuring 1.0 hectares tomatoes, rise, and cucumbers for sale. Monthly income amounts to 30,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing his business, he applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase fertilizers, seeds of melons, peppers and watermelons, and also oilcloths for a hothouse. Rustambek is a member of the Rustam loan group, in which besides him are two other people.

Rustambek plans to invest income from the loan in further development of his business and build a barn for his livestock.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, oilcloth for a hothouse, and seeds of watermelons, melons, and peppers, in order to grow organic vegetables.

loans.name: Maria Cruz

texts.es:
La señora María es una mujer de 53 años de edad, casada, tiene 1 hijo de la edad de 16 años y su negocio es la venta de comida.
Ella es buena madre, generosa, comprensiva,  solidaria, responsable y trabajadora. Su puesto de venta está ubicado en la feria ’16 de julio’ que se realiza los días jueves y domingos; donde se puede encontrar desde una aguja para coser hasta un tractor para arar. De clima frio y seco, con una temperatura ambiente que varía durante el día entre 2-12 grados centígrados.
María es de tez morena, cabello negro largo trenzado, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español por el comercio, Su vida la comparte con su esposo que trabaja ayudándole con la venta de comida,  Viven en una casa alquilada que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, alcantarillado y gas, Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional de la región del altiplano como; Ají de lengua (lengua de vaca, papa, cebolla, acompañada de una de salsa picante), Anticuchos (Brochetas de corazón de vaca, frito a la parrilla, acompañado de papa y salsa picante de maní), Fritanga (cerdo en pequeños trozos, ají, chuño y maíz), Lagua de Chuño (Sopa preparada con chuño, carne de cordero, chalona remojada, papas, hojas de repollo, cebolla, condimentos con orégano), Jakhonta (Preparado con trozos de carne, chuño, papa, hojas de repollo, cebolla; condimentado con orégano), Ispi frito (Pescado pequeño frito. Se sirve con papa puti y mote), Sopa de Karachi (Pescado hecho hervir con papa y cebolla verde). Labor que realiza todos los días de ferias para vender su comida. “aprendí a cocinar desde muy niña me gusta cocinar así que disfruto mi actividad…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una casa propia. Ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de mesas y sillas para atender a sus clientes de forma adecuada. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 9 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Maria solicita un préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para atender a sus clientes de manera adecuada.
texts.en:
María is a 53 year-old woman, is married, has one son who is 16 years old, and has a business selling food. She is a good mother, generous, understanding, supportive, responsible, and hardworking. Her job is located in the fair “16th of July,” that takes place on Thursdays and Sundays. Everything from a needle to sew to a tractor to plow can be found here.  The climate is cold and dry, with a temperature that varies from 2 to 12 degrees Celsius during the day.

María has dark skin, long black braided hair, her native language is Aymara, and she speaks Spanish for her business. She shares her life with her husband, who works to help her with her food sales. They live in a rented house with drinkable water, electricity, a sewage system, and gas. Her business sells traditional food from the Andean plateau, like ají de lengua, (cow tongue, potato, onion, accompanied by a spicy salsa), Anticuchos (kebabs with beef heart, fried on the grill, accompanied by potatoes and spicy peanut salsa), Fritanga (pork in small pieces, pepper, chuño, and corn), Lagua de Chuño (Soup prepared with chuño, meat, potatoes, cabbage leaves, onion, and seasoned with oregano), Jakhonta (Prepared with pieces of meat, chuño, potato, cabbage leaves, onion, seasoned with oregano), Ipsi frito (small fried fish served with potatoes and mote), and Sopa de Karachi (Fish fried with potato and green onion).

She works every fair day to sell her food. She comments, “I learned how to cook when I was very little.  I like to cook, so I enjoy my work.” Her dream is to have her own house.  She wants to increase her business by purchasing tables and chairs to attend to her clients properly. This is her first sequence of loans with this institution in the 9 years that she has been working this job. It is for these reasons that Maria is requesting a loan to purchase tables and chairs to attend to her clients properly.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn by the quintal and lime to make tortillas.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
Mariluz mujer soltera de 34 años de edad, dedica a la venta de ropa y lencería en un almacén que tiene ubicado en la ceja, su mayor ventaja es que su negocio es único en sus alrededores y su mayor reto es hacer que los habitantes de la ceja compren la ropa en su negocio y no se desplacen hasta Medellín a comprarla.
Mariluz de manera cordial pide una ayuda para surtir su negocio, comprara ropa en diferentes tallas y estilos, su pensando es aprovechar la temporada de diciembre y mostrar que en su negocio se pueden acomodar, de lo contrario estaría próxima a una bancarrota y no quiere dejar el negocio que con tanto esfuerzo y noches de trasnocho ha ido construyendo.
texts.en: Mariluz is a 34 year old single mother. She works selling clothing and lingerie in a store that is located in La Ceja. Her main advantage is that her business is the only one in the area. Her main challenge is to have the people of La Ceja buy clothing from her store and not go to Medellin to buy it. Mariluz is politely requesting a loan to buy clothing in different styles and sizes. Her thought is to take advantage of the December season and show that her business can adapt. If not she will be nearly bankrupt and she doesn't want to leave the business that  cost her so much effort and sleepless nights to build.

loans.use: to buy clothing, jeans, shirts, blouses of different sizes and styles for both sexes.

loans.name: Maria Edelmira

texts.es:
María una madre cabeza de familia, tiene 3 hijos, 2 de ellos de 3 años de edad, por lo que debió buscar una profesión que le permitiera estar cerca de sus hijos y al mismo tiempo generar dinero para comprar un alimento y buscar que se eduquen.
Por dichas demanda opto por vender mercancía vendiendo principalmente acolchados, sabanas etc., pero ahora busca un apoyo para la compra de ropa, artículos para el hogar, toallas etc. Su proyección es vender para darles a sus hijos una feliz navidad, algún juguete y que el próximo año inicien sus labores estudiantiles en 1 de primaria.
texts.en:
María is a female head of household. She has three children. Two of them are three years old, so she needed to find a profession that allows her to be near her children at the same time as generate money to purchase food and seek a way to educate them. 

With these requirements, she chose to sell merchandise, selling principally padded items, sheets, etc., but now she looks for a loan to purchase clothing, household items, towels, etc. Her projection is to do sales to provide her children with a Merry Christmas, some toys and that next year they begin their school work in the first grade.

loans.use: to purchase padded items such as sheets, pillows, curtains, an assortment of clothing for men and for women; she is a housewife, responsible for three children.

loans.name: Uzma

texts.en:
Uzma from Pakistan! She is married and has five children. Uzma requested a loan for her husband. He offers Alu Chaat (a Pakistani food) in the evening to the common people of his area. For this purpose, he needs potatoes, tomatoes, yogurt, onion, spices etc. in large quantity.  She helps her husband  prepare Alu Chaat at noon.  He wants to offer more Alu Chaat to his customers because the demand has been increasing from time to time. 

She is 30 years old and the mother of five children, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She hopes that through this loan, her husband will be able to generate more income than before. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan team.

loans.use: a loan helps Uzma's husband to enhance his food stall.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Ella es Gloria una atractiva mujer dedica a la fotografía, madre de 2 hijas de 7 y 14 años, vive con su pareja con la cual comparte los gastos, lo que es vital para llevar la normalidad de su hogar y lo hace con su negocio de toma de fotos.
Gloria genera los recursos suficientes para el mantenimiento de su hogar, pero en temporadas malas, tiene algunas perdidas y con un exhaustivo análisis dieron en que la razón es que la cámara fotográfica que actualmente tienen esta ya obsoleta y necesitan actualizarse de lo contrario perderán más clientes.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de una cámara fotográfica que tenga mejor resolución y cubra las expectativas actuales del mercado.
texts.en:
Gloria is an attractive woman working in photography, and the mother of two daughters, ages 7 and 14. She lives with her partner, with whom she shares the expenses, which is vital to bring normality to the home and she does it with her photography business. 

Gloria generates sufficient resources to maintain the household, but in the bad seasons, she has some losses and with an extensive analysis they realized that the reason is that the camera she has currently is obsolete and they need to update it so that they don't lose more customers.

She asks for a loan to purchase a camera with better resolution and meet the current expectations of the market.

loans.use: to purchase a camera with better resolution since the one she has is very obsolete.

loans.name: Dúo Esfuerzo Group

texts.es:
DUO ESFUERZO
Don Juan Jose es originario de Tecpan, el tiene 30 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad, el se dedica a la compra y venta de laurel.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposa sigue adelante con su negocio, ya que entre los dos se están ayudando para salir adelante con su familia.
El crédito que el recibió lo invirtió en compra de mercadería, ya que gracias a Dios tiene entrega de su producto.
El sueña con ampliar mas su negocio tener mas mercadería para poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, ya que así obtendrá mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor, ya que hoy en día la educación es muy importante, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de Laurel para vender.
texts.en:
"Esfuerzo" Duo

Juan Jose is originally from Tecpan. He is 30 years old and has two children. He makes a living buying and selling laurel.

Thanks to the support of his wife, Juan Jose is able to move forward with his business. Together the couple helps each other to get ahead with their family.

Juan Jose invested his loan in buying merchandise as, thanks to God, he has orders for his goods.

Juan Jose dreams of expending his business further in order to have more merchandise and to be able to satisfy his customers' needs. He would then earn higher profits and send his children to school as education is very important and, with it, they may have a better future. 

Juan Jose is applying for this loan in order to buy laurel to sell.

loans.use: to buy laurel to sell.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en: Merlina is 46 years old, married, and blessed with three children.  She lives in Mitimos, Rizal, Zamboangan Del Norte.  She engages in buy and sell of snack vending, which helps to support their daily expenses.   Merlina was very thankful when she joined Paglaum Cooperatives, because of its benefits and services offered to the members.  Merlina maintained her good credit standing, and she is applying for her second cycle in Paglaum, amounting to PHP 3,000, to buy additional materials for house repair.  Merlina hopes and prays that her business will continue to grow; at the same time she can renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for house repair

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en: Ma. Elena is from Danao, Plaridel. She is 40 years old and is married. Ma. Elena owns and operates a sari-sari store. She has been engaged in her business for over 10 years, and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. Unfortunately, she almost lost her capital when her husband got in a motor accident. PMPC came as a rescue to Ma. Elena, so she could gain access to financial services, to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Ma. Elena is requesting a new loan of 6,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase store inventory and will be used as working capital. She plans to use the revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase store inventory and have working capital

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
Mary una mujer casada, responsable e inquieta que cansada de la monotonía del hogar decidió salir a buscar oportunidades para generar su propio ingreso, como ama de casa no puede descuidar sus hijos en total son 3 y todos son menores de edad por lo que necesitan mucho de su madre.
Mary inicio con su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal como lo son crema de manos, productos capilares, perfumes y con ellos ha podido generarse su propio capital, aportar en su casa, comprarle cosas a sus hijos y demostrarse a ella misma que con ganas e ímpetu puede lograr sus metas.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de productos por catálogo,  ropa, perfumes, cremas de manos y productos capilares.
texts.en:
Mary is a married woman, responsible and lively, who tired of the monotony of the home and decided to go out to look for opportunities to generate her own income. As a housewife, she couldn't neglect her children, who are 3 in all, and all of them are young, so they need their mother a lot.

Mary began her business selling personal products such as hand creams, hair products, perfumes, and with them she has been able to generate her own capital, support the household, buy things for her children, and show herself that with desire and impetus, she can achieve her goals. 

She asks for a loan to purchase items from a catalog, clothing, perfume, hand creams, and hair products.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of clothing, perfumes, hand creams, and hair products.

loans.name: Maria Vitalina

texts.es:
María mujer actualmente separada, madre de 3 hijos, se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas, como chorizos, mazorcas, perros, hamburguesas, etc., en un puesto que tiene ubicado en un lugar estratégico donde ha podido establecer una amistad formal con las personas del sector.
María a pesar de las dificultades que le genero la separación con su esposo ha podido salir adelante, con su experiencia y virtudes busca un apoyo para iniciar con otro carro de comidas, su idea es empelar a un conocido por lo que el crédito que busca lo gastara en la compra de una estufa, mesa, carnes, maíz, chorizos.
texts.en:
María is a woman who is currently separated; she is the mother of three children and works selling fast food such as chorizo [sausages], hamburgers, etc., in a stand that she has located in a strategic location where she has been able to establish a formal friendship with the people in the area.

María, despite the difficulties that her separation from her husband caused, has been able to get ahead. With her experience and virtue, she looks for a loan to start with another food cart, her plan is to employ someone she knows, so that the loan she seeks will be spent purchasing a a stove, table, meat, corn and chorizo.

loans.use: to purchase a stove, meat, a table, corn, sausages; she is a separated woman who was left with the care of three children.

loans.name: Kaleema

texts.en:
Kaleema is a 49-year-old, married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of five children and equally responsible for all of them. She belongs to an ultra-poor family and that is why she cannot afford the family's educational expenses. Most of her children are doing jobs as laborers making daily wages. One of her sons goes with his father to help him in his business. Her husband owns a blacksmith shop in which he provides welding services. He also provides door-to-door services to his customers. Due to the increase in the price of iron, he is unable to buy sufficient welding material such as welding rods, soldering rods, etc. to carry on his business.

To fulfill the demand of his customers and to run his enterprise, he needs some capital to buy welding material. Kaleema has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband so that he would be able to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for manufacturing iron accessories.

Kaleema is very glad and thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy welding rods, soldering rods and iron rods for manufacturing iron accessories.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 47-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. Her husband is a government employee. She has started a clothing business. She wants to support her family through her business. She purchases a variety of clothes from different areas and sells them at a profitable price in the main market. 

Presently, she needs to purchase some clothes to sell. However, due to lack of finances she is facing a problem. For that reason, she is requesting a loan from Kiva and its partner BRAC Pakistan. She is thankful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy clothing for reselling

loans.name: Dzhanyshbek

texts.ru: Джанышбек, 63 года, женат, отец 2 дочерей. У Джанышбека- среднее образование, в данное время занимается сельским хозяйством, также предоставляет услуги по выпасу скота. В хозяйстве Джанышбека на сегодняшний день имеется 1 лошадь и 20 овец. Ежемесячный доход Джанышбека составляет около 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, он обратился в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы. Джанышбек хочет реализовывать молоко местным жителям. Доходы от кредита он планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и накопить на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Dzhanyshbek is 63 years old, married, and the father of two daughters. Dzhanyshbek has a secondary education. Currently, he is involved in agriculture and also offers services grazing livestock. On his homestead, Dzhanyshbek currently has one horse and 20 sheep. Dzhanyshbek's monthly income amounts to about 15,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing his homestead, he applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase a cow. Dzhanyshbek wants to sell milk to local residents.

He plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the quantity of domestic animals and to save for home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase one dairy cow in order to sell dairy products.

loans.name: Laxmi Sriya Group

texts.en:
Swapna, an active married lady of 34 years of age, is a resident of a rural village named Muniguda in Rayagada district of Odisha, India. The lady sitting second from left with raised hand in the photograph is Swapna. She lives with her husband and has no children.  

To increase the income of her family,in the year 2009 Swapna along with other five like-minded women of her locality formed a group and took loan from Mahashakti Foundation for the first time.From 2009 to 2014 Swapna has taken three loans from Mahashakti Foundation and have successfully repaid it.

Swapna has been running a seeds business with the support of her husband for the last 5 years. At present the monthly household income is 7,500 INR. For the growth of the business Swapna needs more investment in the business. This will be her 4th cycle loan and she is planning to  use this loan for  purchasing different types of seeds in a big quantity. Seeds will be purchased in a cheaper rate as per their productions season, and Swapna will sell them when their rate will increase.

The other five members of the group are doing seasonal business, milk business, running a medical shop and a hotel. The loan will definitely change the income level of the members.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds in a big quantity.

loans.name: Gulbarchyn

texts.ru: Гулбарчын 33 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Гулбарчын - высшее образование,она работает в школе учителем русского языка. Также с 2012 года занимается торговлей на вещевом рынке, в обороте есть товар на сумму 50,000 сом (KGS), и животноводством. В хозяйстве Гулбарчын есть 4 коровы и 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход Гулбарчын составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). Гулбарчын обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Гулбарчын планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса и хочет накопить средства на образование и воспитание ее детей.
texts.en:
Gulbarchyn is 33 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising four children. Gulbarchyn has a higher education. She works in a school as a Russian language teacher. In addition, since 2012 she has been involved in trading in a clothing market, with 50,000 som of goods in circulation, and raising livestock. On her homestead, Gulbarchyn has four cows and ten sheep. Gulbarchyn's monthly income amounts to about 20,000 som (KGS).

Gulbarchyn applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock.

Gulbarchyn plans to invest income from the loan in further developing her business and wants to save money for the education and upbringing of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase the size of her herd

loans.name: Estiphen Andres

texts.es:
Esthipen es un hombre soltero de 27 años de edad, con gran habilidad para el comercio, el local que pueden ver lo ha montado él solo, ahorrando capital, ahora tiene una empresa de venta de accesorios, repuestos y arreglo de celulares.
Su negocio aún es muy modesto, necesita mucho capital para constituirlo, reformarlo y tener todos los implementos y repuesto disponible para cualquier daño de celular que llegue a su almacén.
Estiphen solicita un crédito para la compra de accesorios, carcasas y repuestos de celulares de las diferentes marcas y variedad que se encuentran en el mercado.
texts.en:
Estiphen is a single, 27-year-old man with great business abilities.  By himself, he has put together the store that you can see by saving capital.  Now he has a business selling accessories, spare parts, and fixing cell phones.  

His business is very modest.  He needs a lot of capital to stock it, make small changes, and to have all of the implements and spare parts for any type of cell phone damage that may arrive at his store.  Estiphen is requesting a loan to purchase a variety of accessories, cases, and spare cell phone parts in different brands that exist in the market.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of cell phone accessories

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 34 years old and married with two children who are in school. Melanie works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

Melanie has been in this business for 3 years.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Suleyma

texts.es:
Ella es Suleyma, carismática y amante al campo, una mujer decidida y que lucha por el futuro de los suyos.
Desde el año 2010 inicio con un negocio de compra y venta de ganando usando unos hermosos terrenos montañosos, su idea surgió como necesidad de generar ingresos para tener capital suficiente para alimentar a sus dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad y que estos no se queden en el campo toda la vida, que estudien y escojan su camino a seguir.
Aunque el negocio lleva poco tiempo, se trazó una meta de 5 años que esta próxima a cumplir, de que a través de su empresa pueda generar empleo y una excelente calidad de vida por ello trabajara y será constantes en sus ideas.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de ganado recién nacido, el cual cría, levanta y vende cuando tenga la oportunidad
texts.en:
This is Suleyma, a charismatic person who loves the countryside. She is a dedicated woman who fights for her loved ones' futures.
In 2010 she started a business buying and selling livestock on beautiful mountainous lands. She got the idea because she needed to generate an income in order to have sufficient capital to feed her two children ages 4 and 6 and so that they won't have to stay in the countryside their entire lives. They will study and choose their own paths to follow.
Even though she has not had the business for a long time, her 5-year goal is about to be reached: through her business she will be able to generate employment and an excellent quality of life. She will work hard for this and be constant with her ideals.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of newborn livestock which she will raise, care for, and sell when she has the opportunity.

loans.use: to buy young livestock to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Angela Patricia

texts.es:
3 años duro la señora Angela en constituir su negocio de venta de comidas rápidas, con su compañera paso largas jornadas laborales de hasta 15 horas por día buscando que su negocio fuera reconocido y generar utilidad para sobrevivir ante la competencia.
Pasado 3 años de aquellos difíciles día es la propietaria de un buen negocio que busca convertirse en un local comercial pero va paso a paso, Angela quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de silletería, mesas y mayor cantidad de surtido pues ahora podrá tener donde atender los clientes y espera mejores ventas pues su proyecto para el otro año es tener un restaurante en funcionamiento pero necesita tu apoyo.
texts.en:
It took Angela three hard years to build her business selling fast food, with her partner she spent long working days of up to 15 hours a day wanting her business to be recognized and to generate utility to survive faced with the competition. 

Having gone through three years of these difficulties, today she is the owner of a good business that she looks to convert into a commercial space but it is going step by step. Angela wants to ask for a loan to purchase seating, tables and a larger quantity of supplies since now she will be able to have a place to serve customers and she expects more sales; her project for the next year is to have a restaurant up and running but she needs your help.

loans.use: to purchase seating, tables, and supplies such as grains, fruit, vegetables, and meat looking toward the day to transform her business into a restaurant.

loans.name: Yonie

texts.en:
Yonie is 63 years old and is married with seven children. Yonie works very hard to provide for her family.

Yonie runs a food processing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional ingredients like sugar, flour, etc. for her food production business. Yonie has been in this business for 25 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her food production business, like sugar, flour, etc

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco es un agricultor de 58 años de edad, dedicado en cuerpo y alma al campo, sus hermosos cultivos reflejan el cuidado y pasión que este hombre pone en sus actividades ya que dichos cultivos son los únicos que generan una rentabilidad para mantener su hogar. 
Francisco tiene  un problema el cual es que sus bellos campos están siendo amenazados por plagas, por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de pesticidas, insecticidas y fungicidas.
Con tu colaboración francisco podrá erradicar esta invasión y proteger sus hermosos campos.
texts.en:
Francisco is a farmer, 58 years old, dedicated in body and spirit to the countryside. His beautiful crops reflect the care and passion that this man puts into his work, since these crops are the only things that generate a profit to sustain his household. 

Francisco has a problem which is that his beautiful fields are being threatened by pests, so he has asked for a loan to purchase pesticides, insecticides and fungicides. 

With your support, Francisco will be able to eradicate this invasion and support his beautiful fields.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies, pesticide, insecticide and fungicide.

loans.name: Martha Ines

texts.es:
Martha una mujer que en su vida ha estado rodeada por rosas, desde su negocio de floristería hasta los tres regalos que le dio la vida sus hijas, Martha es una mujer muy devota y entregada a Dios, a quien le agradece todos sus triunfos y logros que ha tenido a lo largo de su vida.
Inicio su negocio en el año 2000 por necesidad económica, aprendiendo de este empíricamente la guio más su pasión y amor por las flores que cualquier otra cosa.
Martha quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de flores, y surtido en artículos religiosos, también para la compra de herramienta para el cuidado de las flores.
texts.en:
Martha is a woman who in her life has been surrounded by roses, from her florist business to the three gifts that life gave her, her daughters. Martha is a woman who is very devoted and committed to God, to whom she thanks for all the triumphs and achievements that she has gotten throughout her life. 
She began her business in the year 2000 because of economic needs. Learning from this empirically, she was guided more by her passion and love for flowers than any other thing.
Martha wants to ask for a loan to buy flowers and a stock of religious items, also to purchase a tool to take care of the flowers.

loans.use: to buy a variety of flowers, and a stock of religious items, which is what she sells in her shop.

loans.name: Ramón Enrique

texts.es:
