Ramón en verdad necesita tu ayuda, un hombre valiente y de verdad de admirar que a pesar de sus condiciones hace lo posible para generar ingresos, tiene su negocio de “tienda general”, todos sus productos los tiene ubicados en su casa, que en realidad es una alcoba, donde permanece acostados debido a ciertos problemas que tiene y que no quiere decir ya que no busca generar lastima, más bien quiere que lo apoyen en un crédito para la compra de surtido, darle forma a su tienda y seguir generando el sustento para él.
Ramón vive solo, en verdad si necesita mucho tu apoyo para cambiar su vida, solo espera que este sea el camino hacia una mejor calidad de vida y demostrar que para salir adelante no hay ninguna excusa.
texts.en:
Ramón truly needs your help. He is a valiant person and truly admirable; despite his conditions, he does what he can to generate an income. He has a general store. All of his products are located in his home, which in reality is just a bedroom, where he remains in bed due to certain problems which he does not want to disclose because he does not want to generate talk. He would like you to support him in a loan for the purchase of stock in order to help out his store and allow him to continue to generate an income which sustains him.
Ramón lives alone. He truly needs a lot of your help to change his life. He only hopes that this will be his path toward a greater quality of life and to demonstrate that there are can be excuses in success.

loans.use: to buy stock of candy, crackers, chocolate, fried items, and basic staples.

loans.name: Shagufta

texts.en:
Shagufta is a 35-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Shagufta has applied for a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and little bit of engine maintenance for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. She is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business. Shagufta thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to have maintenance done on her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Mujeres De Fe Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MUJERES DE FE” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Mari es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, taller de cerrajería, carnicería, venta de calzados, tienda, tejido de polainas, venta de mantas, tienda de bordados.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Mari es integrante, ella indica que es el primer año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido a macrame; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su madre hace varios años, ya que ella necesitaba generar recursos para poder establecer su carrera, es por ello que ella emprende este negocio de una forma independiente a su madre. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cordeles por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará a pedido del cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyarse económicamente ya que ella vive sola.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "MUJERES DE FE" group will begin its first cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of the Focal Center of German Busch. It is made up of nine members, and is led by a board of directors where Mari is the President. The women who make up the community association carry out a variety of businesses, among them: selling food, a locksmith shop, a butchering business, selling shoes, a store, knitting leggings, selling tablecloths,a  needle point shop.

The loan that they will receive will help small business owners where Mari is a member. She says that it is her first year in Pro Mujer, and she joined with the invitation of a friend who is works with the institution. She currently has a business making macrame- she says that she learned this trade from her mother several years ago because she needed to earn income to be able to establish her career. This is why she started this business independently from her mother.

The loan that she will receive is to increase her capital (to purchase wholesale cords) that she will purchase from sellers in the city of La Paz, which she will later sell at the request of her clients. Her work allows her to earn income to support herself economically because she lives alone. When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale cords.

loans.name: Dúo Tu En Mi Group

texts.es:
Dúo tu en mi
Este dúo lo conforma la señora Natalia ya es conocida por Fape como socias responsable y puntual en sus pagos. es el tercer crédito que solicita. y ella ha utilizado el dinero para cultivar maíz, frijol, café, criar y engordar animales. Es una persona muy trabajadora que lucha cada día para ayudar a su esposo con el sustento diario del hogar.ella es madre de familia por lo que la hace aun mas luchadora y con ánimo de salir adelante y así poder brindarle lo mejor a sus hijos. Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, abono químico y orgánico, así mismo pollos, marranos y concentrado de engorde y crecimiento.
texts.en:
Natalia is a member of this group, and she is already known at FAPE to be responsible and punctual with her payments.

This is the third loan she is requesting. She has used the money to grow corn, beans, and coffee, and also to raise animals for fattening.

She works hard, striving every day to help her husband with the household expenses. Being a mother, she makes even greater efforts to get ahead and give her children the best.

She is requesting the loan to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, and also to buy chickens and pigs, as well as concentrate for fattening and growth.

loans.use: to buy seeds, chemical and organic fertilizers, and also chickens and pigs, as well as concentrate for fattening and growth.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, and more.

texts.es:
El mayor orgullo de los colombianos son sus campos de café, un producto muy apetecido por el público mundial, debido a su rico sabor, Martin es un caficultor que aporta un grano de arena para que todo hogar pueda disfrutar una taza de café, él es un hombre soltero de 409 años de edad con una pequeña hija de 8 años de edad a la cual le brinda todo su apoyo moral, económico y afectivo.
Martin aprendió todo el oficio gracias a su padre quien también desempeño dicha actividad.
A través de un crédito Martin quiere mejorar su negocio e incluso protegerlo porque quiere invertir en la compra de larvicidas e insecticidas, comprar abono y una mula de carga para transportar su café hasta su almacén donde despacha el producto.
Este crédito le permitirá aumentar sus ventas al tener capital para intervenir sus campos de cultivo.
Si te gusta disfrutar de una exquisita taza de café apoya a este caficultor.
texts.en:
The greatest pride of the Colombians is their fields of coffee, a product desired by the global public due to its rich flavor. Martin is a coffee grower who makes a small contribution so that all households can enjoy a cup of coffee. He is a single man, 49 years old, with a small 8-year-old daughter to whom he provides all the moral, economic, and emotional support.

Martin learned everything about the work thanks to his father who also worked in this field.

With the loan, Martin wants to improve his business and even protect it because he wants to invest in the purchase of larvicides and insecticides, and purchase manure and a pack mule to transport the coffee to his shop where he sells the product. 

This loan will allow him to expand his sales upon having the capital to invest in his fields.

If you like to enjoy an exquisite cup of coffee, support this coffee grower.

loans.use: to purchase larvicide, insecticide, manure and a mule to carry the coffee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, sweets, sweet bread, and more.

loans.name: Maletile

texts.en:
Maletile, a 44-year-old mother of four, operates a small business selling pancakes, buns and pork cakes in her community to earn a living. In business for more than four years, she has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, a fry pan, wooden spoon, bottle of vegetable oil and plastic bags.

Maletile became a member of SPBD in 2011. She hopes to use her profit to build a small bakery store in the near future and provide for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, yeast, a fry pan, wooden spoon, bottle of vegetable oil and plastic bags

loans.name: Heriberto

texts.es:
Heriberto tiene 39 años de edad, es casado, tiene hogar estable al lado de su cónyuge y sus cuatro hijos, vive en casa propia de adobe con piedra y techo de calamina ubicada en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en el distrito son la agricultura y ganadería.

El se dedica al cultivo de café variedad catimor que es resistente a enfermedades, cuenta con 20 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros, lo que le genera ingresos adicionales. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, con esto Heriberto espera mejorar la producción de su cultivo, lo que se verá reflejado en un aumento en su nivel de ingresos, mejorando así su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Heriberto is 39 years old, married and has a stable home with his partner and their four children. Heriberto owns the house where he lives; it is made with adobe bricks, and stones, while the roof is made with corrugated iron. Heriberto lives in the Santo Tomás district of Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. Here the main source of work comes from farming and cattle-raising.

Heriberto himself makes a living growing Catimor coffee, which is resistant to disease. He has 20 years' experience in the business and has very good personal and professional references locally. In addition, Heriberto works raising young animals, including hens, guinea pigs, piglets and others. This work generates an extra income for Heriberto.

This loan will be used to buy manure and fertilisers to look after Heriberto's coffee crops. With the loan, he hopes to improve production, and for this to be reflected in his income so that his and his family's quality of life may increase.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilisers to look after his coffee crops.

loans.name: Luz Viviana

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer creativa, trabajadora, honesta y honrada que se dedica al negocio de venta de alimentos en un espacio que con sus propias manos ha estado adecuando.
Gracias a este negocio Luz puede generar los ingresos suficientes para llevar alimento a su hogar en donde la espera su hijo que tiene 10 años de edad.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de sillas, carpas, mesas, surtido de alimento en granos, carnes,  empaques de frituras, dulces,
Con la ayuda de este crédito podrá constituir su negocio pues tendrá lso elementos básicos para operar.
texts.en:
Luz is a creative, hardworking, honest and honorable woman who works selling food in a space that she has been adapting with her own hands. 

Thanks to this business, Luz can generate sufficient income to bring food to her home, where her son who is 10 years old waits for her. 

She asks for a loan to purchase chairs, awnings, tables, and an assortment of grains, meats, packets of fried food and sweets. 

With the help of this loan, she will be able to build her business since she will have the basic elements to run it.

loans.use: to purchase chairs, tables, an awning, and an assortment of grains, meats, packets of fried food, and sweets which will allow her to have the basic elements to run her business.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
Maria Teresa tiene 40 años de edad, es casada. Su familia es unida, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores (chanchos, patos, cuyes, etc.), cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, así como alimento balanceado para estos y reparaciones del lugar donde los cría. Con esto Maria Teresa espera mejorar la productividad de su negocio, ofreciendo así un producto de mayor calidad a sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en mayores niveles de ingreso y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Teresa is 40 years old, married, and has a close-knit family. She lives in her own home along with her husband and children in the District of Cayaltí in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. The community where she lives is known for trade, agriculture, and livestock breeding.

Maria Teresa raises and sells small animals such as pigs, ducks, guinea pigs, and other livestock. She has more than 10 years of experience in this business. Maria Teresa has very good personal and work-related references who are from her district. This loan will be used to buy a large quantity of animals for her business. In addition, she will purchase balanced feed and pay for repairs to the place where the animals are raised. With this loan, Maria Teresa hopes to improve the productivity of her business and offer a better quality product to her customers. This will be reflected in a higher level of income and eventually a better quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: to pay for a large quantity of animals for her business, balanced feed, and repairs to the animal pens.

loans.name: Dúo Redencion Group

texts.es: Dúo Redencion: Este Grupo esta conformado por la señora Agueda Ana de 46 años de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de costuras desde hace varios años, en esta oportunida ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de telas(materia prima) para seguir elaborando costuras, gracias a Dios su negocio poco a poco a ido creciendo espera que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado.
texts.en:
"Redención" Duo

One member of this duo is Agueda Ana, who is 46 years old. She has been making a living sewing and selling for a number of years. On this occasion she is applying for a loan in order to buy material to continue with her work. Thanks to God, Agueda's business is expanding. She hopes that you can help her with this loan.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies for sewing work.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es: Gloria Elizabeth es originaria del área de san Martin Jilotepeque,  tiene 27 años de edad y desde hace cuatro años  posee una zapatería. En  su zapatería ofrece a sus clientas muchos estilos de sandalias, zapatos de vestir, y zapatos de niñas y niños. En la localidad la visitan muchas personas en su zapatería ya que vende zapatos de muy buena calidad. Está muy contenta porque gracias a su negocio ha salido adelante. Junto a su esposo luchan por salir adelante y darle lo mejor a su pequeña niña de tan solo 4 añitos. En este crédito tuvo varios días de atraso debido a que estaba embarazada y tuvo un aborto no planificado estuvo mucho tiempo en reposo ahora ya se recupero y sigue luchando por cumplir sus sueños de  surtir más tu zapatería, ofrecer un mejor surtido a sus clientas y siempre atender muy bien para que sus clientas estén satisfechas.esta solicitando este credito para la compra de Calzado para vender.
texts.en:
Gloria Elizabeth is from the area of San Martin Jilotepeque. She is 27 years old and for four years, has had a shoe store. In her shoe store, she offers her clients many styles of sandals, dress shoes, and shoes for boys and girls. Many people visit her shoe store since she sells very high-quality shoes. She is very happy because thanks to her business, she has gone forward. She and her husband fight to go forward and give the best to their young daughter, who is only 4 years old. 

For this loan, she had some days of delay because she was pregnant and had an unplanned miscarriage. She was resting for some time while she recuperated and then continued fighting to achieve her dreams to supply her shoe store with more shoes to offer a better selection to her clients. She also takes good care of her clients so that they are satisfied. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy shoes to sell.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman is a fisherman from Iloilo, Philippines. He is 44 years old, married, and has five children. Arman has been in the fishing business for more than seven years now.

Arman is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and floaters. With a loan, he will be able to improve his catch, thus allowing him to sell more fish to the market.

In the future, Arman has hopes of making his fishing business a success. Moreover, he wants to save money for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and floaters

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma is thankful that she was granted a 10,000 PHP loan, which she used to pay for raw ingredients needed for her food stall. She is glad that through her earnings she was able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expenses. She also has  a general store business.

She would like to apply for another 10,000 PHP loan which she will use to buy more quantities of grocery items like rice, processed meat products, coffee, soda, eggs, sugar, noodles and frozen foods that she sells on a retail basis. She knows that more items in her store will yield more sales and thus increase her earnings. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs and for the education of her children. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her. She wishes everyone a blessed Christmas!

Elma dreams of having a bigger general store and aims to give her children the best education possible in order for them to have a better future. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
Felipe tiene 52 años de edad, es casado. Su familia es unida, vive con su cónyuge y sus tres hijos en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, comercio y transporte.

El se dedica al comercio de carne y productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con 23 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales en su distrito. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de mercadería para aumentar el stock de su negocio, con esto Felipe espera satisfacer los gustos y preferencias de sus clientes, lo que se verá reflejado en un aumento en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Felipe is 52 years old and is married. His family is together. He lives with his partner and their three children in the district of Pucará, which is located in the province of Jaén, the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The population of this district is dedicated to agriculture, livestock, business, and transportation. 

Felipe is dedicated to the selling meat and other items, like rice and sugar, among other things. His business is located in his home. He has 23 years of experience in this business and has very good personal references in his district. 

This loan will be used to buy more merchandise to increase the stock of his business. With this, Felipe hopes to satisfy the desires and preferences of his clients, which will be reflected in an increase in his level of income and will improve his and his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to increase the stock of his business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 48 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school, Teresita works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy and sell of old tires business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of old tires to sell.

Teresita has been in this business for 20 years. 

In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of old tires to sell

loans.name: Ma. Leah

texts.en:
Ma. Leah is 25 years old, married and has two children, one of whom is in school. 

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional feeds.

Ma. Leah has been pig fattening for 4 years now, and has borrowed times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feeds

loans.name: Alina

texts.ru: Алина, 31 год, замужем, мать 2 детей. Алина в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается сельским хозяйством. Стартовав в 2003 году, на сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Алины есть 2 коровы и 10 овец. На участке мерою 1,44 Га Алина выращивает пшеницу и кукурузу для реализации. Ежемесячная прибыль- около 10,000 сомов (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Алина планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Alina is 31, married, and a mother of two children.  She works as a farmer, and the money she earns from farming is the primary source of income for her family.  She first started in 2003 and currently has two cows and ten sheep on her farm as well as 1.44 hectares of land for growing wheat and corn as cash crops, while her monthly profit is roughly 10,000 som.  To further develop her business, she's requested a loan of 60,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to buy livestock to increase her headcount of animals.  She plans on using her extra income due to the loan to expand her business further.

loans.use: buy livestock to increase her headcount of animals

loans.name: Digna Consuelo

texts.es: Doña Digna tiene 49 años de edad es madre de 3 hijos los cuales colaboran en casa en las diferentes actividades que a diario se realizan como también en el campo pues ella es madre soltera. Ella es ama de casa y agricultura actividad que aprendió gracias a su familia sus padres son agricultores por generaciones y en su juventud le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra. Doña Digna en compañía de sus hijos se involucran en las diferentes actividades que se realizan en la agricultura como ser: la recolección del grano, limpieza de la tierra y la planta, aplicación de abono, fertilizantes, foliares entre otros pues como fuente principal de ingresos para el sustento ponen el 100% de su esfuerzo para obtener las mejores cosechas cada temporada. Ella tiene un grado de educación primario completado gracias al esfuerzo y sacrificio de sus padres por lo cual agradece a sus padres. En esta ocasión ella solicita se le apoye económicamente para poder comprar los insumos como: fertilizantes, formula cafetalera, formula de crecimiento para poder lograr mejores resultados y mayor cantidad de grano en la próxima temporada. En un futuro ella espera adquirir un pedazo más de tierra poder heredar a sus hijos y que puedan enfrentar los problemas económicos y demás de manera favorable ya que la agricultura es su único medio de ingreso para cubrir las diferentes necesidades que a diario surgen.
texts.en: Digna is 49 years old. She has 3 children, who help at home in different daily activities as well as in the fields, because she is a single mother. She is a housewife and a farmer. She learned this activity thanks to her family. Her parents are farmers and her family has been for generations. In her youth, they taught her to work the land. Digna and her children work in the different farming activities such as harvesting the beans, clearing the land, weeding the plants, and applying fertilizer and foliar sprays, among other things. Since it is their main source of income to support themselves, they put 100% of their efforts into obtaining the best harvests every season. She has a complete primary education thanks to her parents efforts and sacrifice, for which she is grateful. At this time, she is asking for financial support to be able to buy materials such as fertilizer, coffee formula, and growth formula to obtain the best results and a larger quantity of beans for the next season. In the future, she hopes to acquire another piece of land to be able to leave it to her children so they can face financial and other problems successfully. Farming is their only source of income to cover all of the daily needs that arise.

loans.use: to buy agricultural  materials to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es: Gladis se encuentra muy feliz y muy satisfecha porque gracias al apoyo financiero brindado por la cooperativa COMIXMUL ella pudo asistir sus cultivos de café logrando comprar fertilizantes, urea y nutricafe, insumos que logro aplicar a sus cultivos para que estos tuvieran el mantenimiento adecuado y la planta se mantuviera sana obteniendo una excelente cosecha de café la temporada pasada. En la actualidad Gladis quiere nuevamente asistir sus cultivos de café de los cuales espera tener magníficos resultados en la próxima temporada pues quiere también comprar nueva plantilla de café para sembrar y ampliar sus parcelas de café y en la próxima temporada obtener mayores y mejores resultados esperando que los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA le apoyen nuevamente ya que sus ingresos y mejoramiento de su propiedad, plantación y familia dependen del trabajo de campo y si no tiene el capital que necesita para comprar los insumos su plantación se puede ver afectada por una plaga u enfermedad y lo que ella quiere es evitar que eso pase.
texts.en:
Gladis is very happy and content because thanks to the financial support provided by the COMIXMUL cooperative, she was able to help her coffee crops by purchasing fertilizers, urea and nutricafe. She was able to apply these inputs to her crops so that they are appropriately maintained, and so that the plants remain healthy. She had an excellent coffee harvest last season.

Currently, Gladis wants to help her coffee crops again, and she expects to have magnificent results next season. She also wants to buy new coffee plants to plant and to expand her coffee plot so that in the next season she can have bigger and better results. 

She hopes that the lenders on the Kiva platform will support her again, because her income and property improvements, plantation and her family depend on working in the field, and if she does not have the capital that she needs to purchase the inputs, her plantation may be affected by a plague or a disease. She wants to make sure that this does not happen.

loans.use: to purchase new agricultural inputs to help her coffee crop in the new season.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre casado de 70 años de edad viven en una comunidad de Solola, junto a su esposa. 

Francisco es una persona ya mayor de edad, pero le encanta trabajar, es un agricultor experimentado desde hace 30 años, le fascina el cultivo, él siembra todo lo que se da en la región, él a pesar de que ya todos sus hijos están independientes de él, pero el siempre necesita de generar sus ingresos económicos. Francisco es una persona que no se haya estar en su casa, a él el gusta convivir con la naturaleza, el anhelo de Francisco es seguir cultivando la tierra, pero  uno de los obstáculos es que no cuenta  con capital de trabajo,  pues  la solución de él es conseguir un préstamo para comprar sus insumos agrícolas  cubrir todos los gastos relacionados  a la siembra. 

 La meta de Francisco es conseguir el préstamo, pero él tiene la plena confianza de conseguirlo, para hacer realidad sus sueños al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Francisco is 70 years old and married. He lives with his wife in a community in Solola.

Francisco is an older man now but he loves to work. He is a farmer and has 30 years' experience. He is fascinated by crops and grows everything that he can. Although Francisco's children are now independent he still needs to earn an income. Francisco is not somebody who likes to sit around at home; rather he wants to be in nature. Francisco's wish is to continue working the land but one obstacle facing him is that he has no capital. To solve this problem, he is applying for a loan to buy farming supplies and cover all costs related to growing crops.

Francisco's goal is to be offered this loan. He has confidence that he can do this and, with his wife, make his dreams come true.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Chansok's Group

texts.en: Chansok’s group lives in a rural village in Battambang province in Cambodia. Chansok works as a farmer to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help this woman and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Enilsa Ruth

texts.es:
Enilsa es una mujer del campo que se dedica a la fabricación de alimentos con este trabajo genera el sustento para su familia que lo conforma su pareja y sus 3 hijos, para ella su familia son el soporte y la razón de trabajar cada vez mas duro.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de carnes, frutas, verduras, granos para realizar alimentos y seguir consolidando sus ventas para un mejor para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Enilsa is a woman who lives in the country and earns her living by preparing food. Through this work, she is able to generate income to support her family, which consists of her partner and their three children. Her family is her source of support, so they are the reason why she works very hard each day.

Enilsa is requesting a loan in order to buy meats, fruits, vegetables, and grains so that she can prepare her dishes. She will be able to continue consolidating her sales so that she can provide the best for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Mecbure

texts.en:
Mecbure is married and has four children She began selling underwear two years ago, following a friend’s example. She sells in her neighborhood and village. She helps support her family and meets her expenses doing this work. Since she started doing this work, she doesn’t have to ask her husband as much and enjoys making money. She’ll use the loan to buy underwear to sell.She is ambitious and hard working.
Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Mecbure Hanım  evli ,dört çocuk annesi.  İki yıl önce arkadaşından görünce çamaşır satma işine girmiş.  Mahallesinde ve köyünde satış yapıyor. Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile çamaşır satın alacak.  Yaptığı işle ailesine katkı sağlıyor ve cep harçlığını çıkarıyor.  Bu işe başladıktan sonra eşinden daha az harçlık istediğini kendi parasını kazanmanın hazzını yaşadığını söylüyor. Mezbure Hanım,hırslı ve çalışkan bir kadın.

loans.use: to buy underwear

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is the age of 50; she is a mother of four sons and one daughter, and is living in Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a general store in which he sells rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap, biscuits, etc. He manages his household necessities from his own store as well. He has some relatives who would like to purchase from his general store. He speaks with a monotonous tone which is impressive, and he easily wins the trust of others. Due to his behavior and tone, he has built up very good relationships with his customers. 

His general store is very famous in the town; that is the reason his business is running well. Due to good relations, his sales have increased a lot, but he does not have sufficient stock to cope with the demand. Therefore, Azra requested a loan for her husband so that he can buy more sacks of rice for his general store. Azra thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice for reselling for her husband's general store business

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
A $ 1200.00 loan is offered to Georgina to improve her business. She has a business where many people come to printing and copy every day. She will be using to loan for printing paper, black printing ink and color printing ink. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2012. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.
Running a business has made Georgina  independent because she can be responsible for herself and also helping her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.And she is happy with the loan because it improves her living condition in the future,

loans.use: to buy printing paper, black printing ink and color printing ink.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
Fernando es un hombre trabajador de 41 años que gracias a su cultivo de caña ha logrado generar el sustento para su pareja y sus dos hijos que son menores de edad y que aspira seguir teniendo dinero para que se eduquen y busque su propio camino. 
En su trabajo hay altibajos, momentos de alta temporada, de baja temporada pero lo que sí es constante son los nutrientes, e insumos que necesita sus cultivos y que en ocasiones no puede mantener pro lo que solicita un crédito para la compra de nutrientes para su campo, abonándolos y seguir ejerciendo el trabajo que ha realizado desde hace 20 años.
texts.en:
Fernando is a hardworking man who is 41 years of age. Thanks to his sugar cane crop, he is able to generate income to support his partner and their two young children. He aspires to continue earning income so that he can educate his children and help them find their own way.

There are highs and lows in his work. Despite the high and low seasons, the things that are constant are the nutrients and supplies that are needed for his crops. On a few occasions, he has not been able to maintain his crops. For this reason, he is requesting a loan so that he can buy nutrients for his field. He will be able to fertilize his land and continue the work he has been doing for 20 years.

loans.use: to buy nutrients so that he can fertilize and care for his crops.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.en:
Thirty-six-year-old Maribel has been engaged in a fishing business for 14 years now. She is married with four children. Her eldest is 18, and the youngest is 2. 

She is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy a hull and boat engine. This is to replace a part of the boat that was damaged by the typhoon. Maribel hopes that the loan will make the recovery faster for her family. Her income will provide food and school fees for her children.

In the future, she hopes to improve her fishing, adapt to new technology for expansion, and increase the business profits.

loans.use: to buy a hull and boat engine

loans.name: Bartolomea

texts.en:
This is Bartolomea. She sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will lend her an amount of 21,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional stock of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers will be likely to buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase in sales will also result in a significant increase in profit, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Bartolomea hopes that her business will continue to operate in the coming years. She also wants to have a wider and better place for her business. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Helna Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Las tribulaciones y problemas solo fueron una prueba para esmerarse con su negocio y sacarlo adelante, luego de que su esposo le mandara remesas para levantar el negocio comenzó su reto en tener un negocio surtido y grande. Helna es una joven, pero con mucha experiencia y buenos conocimientos en administración y contabilidad que hasta el momento le han permitido mantener en orden las finanzas del negocio, así también como el pago de los créditos. Helna quien tiene que hacerse cargo de su mama y de su hijo de 2 años, espera seguir trabajando arduamente para ofrecerles una mejor calidad de vida. 
Helna tiene muchas visiones de su negocio pero para que siga creciendo solicita el crédito para la compra de productos para surtir su negocio, estos productos relacionados a la época navideña ya que de esa manera aprovechara que son los productos más demandados por sus clientes, necesita comprar las bebidas, granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, etc. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento que le ayudara a surtir su negocio y a mejorar sus ganancias. Helna cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quién le envía remesas para solventar las necesidades de su hogar, como planes futuros espera poder comprar otra casa donde podrá instalar otro negocio.
texts.en:
The trials and tribulations were just a test for Helna to push herself with her business and get it ahead. After her husband sent her remittances to start up her business, the challenge of having a well-stocked, large business began. Helna is a young woman, but she has lots of experience and a good understanding of administration and accounting, which has allowed her to keep her business' finances and her loan payments in order.

Helna has had to take care of her mother and her two-year old son, and she hopes to continue working hard to offer them a better quality of life. Helna has many visions of her business, but for it to continue growing, she is requesting this loan to purchase products relating to the Christmas season to stock her business. This way, she can take advantage of the fact that these are the products most-requested by her clients. She needs to purchase drinks and basic grains such as rice and beans. 

She is trusting that the financing will help her to stock her business and to improve her income. Helna has her husband's support- he sends remittances to help with the household needs. In the future, she hopes to be able to purchase another home where she can start up another business.

loans.use: to purchase drinks and basic grains such as rice and beans.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto un solitario pero alegre campesino, que a sus 49 años de edad vive solo pues se separó de su esposa y no logro tener hijos.
Edilberto se dedica al cultivo de plátanos, una actividad que necesita un apoyo grande, pues ha venido sufriendo problemas, inconvenientes climáticos y de orden social que han hecho cerrar plataneras, pero aún quedan aquellos orgullosos que hacen lo posible por mantener su profesión y seguir las raíces y el camino que sus viejos le enseñaron.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de abonos e insumos de mantenimiento de cultivos como riegos, pesticidas, fungicidas.
texts.en:
Edilberto, a solitary but happy person of the countryside, who at 49 years old lives alone since he separated from his wife and wasn't able to have children.

Edilberto works growing bananas, work that needs a lot of support, since it has been having problems, bad weather, and a social order that has made  banana distributors close, but there are still some proud people who remain that make it possible to maintain their profession and follow their roots and the path that their elders have taught them. 

He asks for a loan to purchase manure and supplies to maintain his crops such as irrigation, pesticides and fungicides.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to maintain his banana plantation, such as manure, irrigation, pesticides and fungicides.

loans.name: Maria Luz Dary

texts.es:
María Dary es una emprendedora de 62 años de edad, vive sola y solo depende de su negocio de servicios de videojuegos muy enfocado en la consola Xbox, decidió iniciar con dicho negocio ante la urgencia  de generar recursos ella vive sola y no tiene apoyo y espera encontrarlo en la alianza Kiva-Interactuar.
Su negocio indirectamente es beneficioso para el barrio, mantiene a los jóvenes alejados de las calles y de las bandas y pensando un poco en eso quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de televisores y consolas de videojuegos para tener mayor capacidad.
texts.en:
María Dary is an entrepreneur, 62 years old, who lives alone and only depends on her business which is a video game service, very focused on Xbox consoles. She decided to open this business due to the urgency of generating an income. She lives alone and doesn't have support and hopes to find it with the Kiva-Interactuar alliance.

Her business is indirectly beneficial for the neighborhood, since it keeps the young people out of the streets and the gangs, and thinking a little in this, she wants to ask for a loan to purchase televisions and video game consoles to have more capacity.

loans.use: to purchase televisions and Xbox consoles; she is a single 62-year-old woman who depends solely on her business.

loans.name: Simon Alfonso

texts.es:
Simón un sonriente, casero y con un sazón para la cocina impresionante, tiene un restaurante en un sector rural, un negocio poco común en el campo ya que por lo general este tipo de negocios se encuentra en el pueblo o la cabecera municipal de algún municipio.
Simón es padre de una bella hija de 22 años de edad y su mayor orgullo es que ella se encuentra en la universidad y puede estudiar gracias a los ingresos que le deja su humilde hogar.
Simón solicita un crédito para realizar adecuaciones locativas, una mano de pintura a las paredes a las mesas y sillas y comprar de algunos implementos para la cocina es lo que necesita.
Su objetivo es tener su local hermoso para iniciar de mejor manera el próximo año.
texts.en:
Simón, a smiling landlord with an impressive flavor in the kitchen, has a restaurant in a rural area. This isn't very common in the countryside, since generally this type of business is located in a town or the municipal capital of a city.

Simón has a beautiful 22-year-old daughter. He is most proud of the fact that she is at university and can study, thanks to the income that he provides to his humble home.

Simón is requesting a loan to carry out facility adaptations. He also wants to put a coat of paint on the walls, tables, and chairs, and to buy some utensils that he needs for the kitchen.

His goal is to have his restaurant looking beautiful to start the next year in the best way possible.

loans.use: to carry out facility reforms, to paint the walls, tables, and chairs, and to buy some utensils that he needs for the kitchen.

loans.name: Jebelyn

texts.en:
Jebelyn, a 33-year-old married mother of three children, all of whom are in school, works very hard to provide for her family. For five years she has been operating a general store in the Philippines.

Jebelyn has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell such as sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks to sell such as sardines, soft drinks, noodles, etc

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 38-year-old woman, living with her five children and her spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. The family is poor, supported by her husband who rents and drives an auto rickshaw. Now that his children are growing older and their needs have increased, he has decided to buy his own rickshaw.

Nasreen has been saving for many days to buy a new rickshaw for him, but at the time of purchasing she does not have enough money. She has therefore requested a loan so that, along with their ssvings, her husband can buy a new rickshaw.

Nasreen hopes that now her husband will be able to generate more income because he will no longer have to pay a daily rental fee. She is very happy about this loan opportunity, and thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her husband's transportation services.

loans.name: Sajdha's Group

texts.en:
Sajdha is 38 and living with her spouse and five children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband is a milkman by trade; he sells milk in the market. His customers like to buy fresh, delicious milk from his shop. His monthly net income is too low to meet the household needs because there are too many competitors in the market for the customers as well.

Due to quality and low reasonable rates, many of the customers like to buy milk from him. He wants to increase the stock of milk on a daily basis and wants to buy milk in a large quantity, but he does not have enough cash in hand to buy milk in a large quantity.

Therefore, Sajdha has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan so that her husband would be able to buy more milk in bulk to sell.

Sajdha is very happy after receiving this loan; she thanks Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy milk in bulk for reselling and for producing yogurt.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 23 años de edad, soltero, tiene un hijo de 2 años, y trabaja como mecánico automotriz.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, inteligente, cuidadoso, responsable y trabajador. Su trabajo lo realiza en la localidad de Sacaba, un sitio que se mantiene como granero de la ciudad, por la producción de cereales, verduras y frutas, hasta en los distritos urbanos. Maíz, trigo, cebada, hortalizas, frutilla, plátanos, papayas, naranjas, manzanas, duraznos y hasta plantas de tumbo se producen en Sacaba. También tienen granjas de pollos e incluso trabajan en la apicultura.
Miguel es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y también habla español por cultura general y por el trabajo que realiza. Recientemente heredó un terreno familiar, el cual se encuentra en una zona alejada, y no cuenta con instalaciones de agua potable, tiene electricidad y agua de pozo. “mi deseo es darle un lugar en buenas condiciones para que mi familia pueda vivir de buena manera…” comenta. Su sueño es terminar de construir su casa, el desea realizar la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Miguel solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para darle un futuro mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Miguel is 23 years old, single and has a 2 year old child. He works as a vehicle mechanic.
He is entrepreneurial, independent, intelligent, careful, responsible and hard working. He works in the area of Sacaba, a place that supports itself as the granary of the city, as it produces cereals, fruit and vegetables, even in the urban areas. Corn, flour, barley, green vegetables, strawberries, bananas, papayas, oranges, apples, peaches and even large passion fruits are all produced in Sacaba. There are also chicken farms and people even work in bee-keeping. 
Miguel is dark skinned, short, has short black hair and his mother tongue is Quechua which is spoken where he lives and he also speaks Spanish because of general culture and for the work that he does. He recently inherited family land, which is in a remote area, and it does not have drinking water installed. It does have electricity and a water well. 'My desire is to give my family somewhere in good condition to live so that they can live in a better way...', he sais. His dream is to finish building his house, he wants to install drinking water in the kitchen, bathroom and laundry. This is his first loan cycle with the institution in the two years that he has been doing this.
It is for these reasons that Miguel is asking for a loan to install drinking water in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry to give his family a better future.

loans.use: to install drinking water in his kitchen, bathroom and laundry in order to give his family a better future.

loans.name: Yessica

texts.es:
Yessica es una bella mujer de 20 años de edad, madre de un hijo de 6 años, criada con unas muy buenas costumbres, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión y gusto por todo lo relacionado con la belleza.  

Inicio su etapa productiva realizando cursos y capacitaciones, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido pues también quiere vender productos para complementar sus servicios, como crema de manos, gel, productos capilares, tinturas para cabello, barnices. 

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese de la mano de Interactuar y tenga muchos clientes ya que será determinante porque dejo su hogar para aventurarse en la ciudad buscando un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Yessica is a beautiful 20-year old woman, and the mother of a 6-year old son. Raised with good habits, since school she has developed a great passion and interest for everything relating to beauty.

She began her productive stage by taking courses and trainings, until one day she ventured and decided to search for her own clientele and opening a beauty salon in her home.

She is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise because she wants to sell products that complement her services, such as hand cream, gel, hair products, hair dye and nail polishes. 

The loan is very important to her because she will consolidate her business, completing it with all of the inputs that are necessary to operate and offer any service that her clients may request of her. Her dream is that her company may grow with Interactuar and that she may have many clients. This will be very important, given that she left her home behind to venture into the city looking for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as hand cream, gel, hair products, hair dye and nail polishes.

loans.name: Tarciana

texts.en:
Tarciana is from Mangidkid, Plaridel. She is a diligent and industrious mother who has always been known to provide the best for her family. She is earning a living through buying and selling grocery items. 

To generate more income, Tarciana  decided to expand her resources after she learned that she can get financial assistance from PMPC. As Tarciana has saved an amount from her business, she thought of doing farming activities to earn additional income. 

Consequently, she requested a loan to pay for the acquisition of a pawned parcel of agricultural land to start her farming project. Tarciana smiles at the thought of having a comfortable life and providing her family and even her grandchildren a better life.

loans.use: to pay for the acquisition of a pawned parcel of agricultural land to start her farming project

loans.name: Darling Carolina

texts.es: Darling Carolina, mayor de edad casada con tres hijos los cuales son menores de edad y aun bajo su responsabilidad originaria del municipio de chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, zona que se caracteriza por ser productivamente comercial y turistica, es administradora y propietaria de su propio negocio el cual consiste en una pulperia donde ofrece productos de consumo del hogar como: venta de granos básicos, leche en polvo, pan, tang, golosinas, bolsitas de shampoo, cosméticos, desodorantes, cremas para el cuerpo, jabon, detergentes, leña, sopas maggis, pastes para bañar, papel higienicos, toallas sanitarias, productos congelados como:gaseosa,pollo,hielo, jugos entre otros productos. sus compras son al contado y al credito a camiones distribuidores, distribuidoras de esta misma localidad, tiene clientes fijos y eventuales a los cuales les ofrece al contado y al credito donde recupera quincenal, sus ventas son al  contado y al crédito, Darling es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superacion personal, inicia este negocio  con dinero y capital propio porque son productos que todos consumen en cualquier época del año, empezo con una pequeña Pulpería o negocio muy pequeño y así ha venido incrementando poco a poco con el capital que ha adquirido, ganancias y ayuda de préstamos que se le han otorgado negocio el cual tiene ya 6 años de experiencia,el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en mi negocio para capital de trabajo, surtir mi negocio Granos básicos en general, gaseosas, golosinas, pollo, crema, queso, cosmeticos entre otros productos mas y de esa forma aprovechar demanda de fin de año, al crecer la magnitud de su negocio puede comprar a mejores precios y al contado a sus proveedores, surtir de todo lo que no pueda tener, los productos mas demandantes y asi obtener mayor volumen de ingresos, mas ganancias  y ofertarle mejores precios a sus clientes para que se mantengan fieles a su Negocio ósea mantener clientela ya existente y captar nueva clientela.
texts.en:
Darling Carolina is older and married with three children, who are young and still under her care. She is from the municipality of Chinandega, which is located in the Western part of the county. The area is characterized as productive from business and tourism. She is the administrator and owner of her own business, which is a store where she offers products for household consumption, including basic grains, powdered milk, bread, Tang, sweets, bags of shampoo, cosmetics, deodorants, body lotion, soap, detergents, firewood, Maggi’s soups, bathing products, toilet paper, sanitary pads, frozen products, soda, chicken, ice, and juice, among other products.

She purchases these products with cash and by credit from truck distributors. The distributors are from the same area. She has fixed clients and to some she offers the option of paying by cash and credit, which she collects on biweekly. Her sales are made by cash and by credit. 

Darling is a hard-working and responsible woman, and she has many dreams for personal achievement. She started this business with her own money and capital because the products are such that everyone can consume them in any time of the year. She started with a small store and a very small business, and thus has sold products little by little using: the capital that she has acquired, earnings, and help from loans that have been offered to her business. She has 6 years of experience in her business. 

The goal of this loan is to invest in her business for capital to stock her business with basic grains, soda, sweets, chicken, lotion, cheese, and cosmetics, among other items. In this way, she will take advantage of higher demand at the end of the year. By growing the scale of her business, she will be able to buy her products at better prices and with cash from her suppliers. She will supply all of the products she can, including the products that are most in demand. Thus, she will have more income, more earnings, and she will be able to offer better prices to her clients so that they remain faithful to her business; she will keep the clients she already has and will capture new clients.

loans.use: to invest in capital for her business that she will use to buy daily consumption products, including basic grains, frozen products, firewood, gas, sweets, and cosmetics, among other products.

loans.name: San Juanico El Alto Group

texts.es:
En la comunidad donde se encuentra ubicado el grupo de préstamo "San Juanico el Alto" está rodeada de enormes cerros con campos verdes. Ahora que el invierno se acerca, la temperatura realmente desciende y los cerros se cubren de neblina, pero el calor está en los hogares de las familias reunidas para celebrar juntos las fiestas de fin de año. 

Los integrantes de la asociación son personas muy trabajadoras, siempre están dispuestos hacer lo posible para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus familias. Miguel Ángel, uno de los  miembros, se caracteriza por su buen humor y amabilidad, tiene 27 años, es soltero y vive con su mamá quien depende económicamente de él. Para cubrir los gastos de su casa, desde hace 10 años se ha dedicado a vender tambos azules que compra en el estado de Querétaro (a 4 horas de donde él vive) en una fábrica de jabones; los tambos forman parte del material que ya no se utiliza en la fábrica y los adquiere a un menor precio.

Para vender este material de reciclaje, Miguel viaja hasta el estado de Michoacán, también a 4 horas de distancia de su hogar, donde permanece tres o cuatro días a la semana; cuando casi casi ha vendido toda la mercancía regresa a la zona industrial para comprar más tambos y seguir ofreciendo variedad. Miguel inició con esta actividad porque trabajó durante dos años con un señor que se dedicaba a lo mismo, notó que era un buen negocio y decidió seguir por su cuenta. Lo logró gracias al primer préstamo de VisionFund que le facilitó comprar los primeros tambos y ahora cada que termina de pagar un crédito, solicita uno más, como en este caso que invertirá para comprar más tinacos y para hacer algunos arreglos a su camioneta que utiliza para trasladarlos. 

El mayor anhelo de Miguel es expandir su negocio y poder ofrecer empleo a otros jóvenes en su comunidad, tal como él inició. 

Los demás integrantes del grupo son Tania quien invertirá en alfarería; Ma Guadalupe, en su estética; Anahi, en su papelería; Beatriz, en venta de producto lácteo; Blanca, en su molino y Guadalupe, en la venta de perfumes.

*La fotografía fue tomada en el jardín del municipio, los integrantes del grupo estaban muy emocionados porque por primera vez habían viajado hasta el centro, normalmente todos sus trámites se realizaban en su comunidad.
texts.en:
The community where the loan group “San Juanico el Alto” is located, is surrounded by enormous hills with green fields. Now that winter is approaching, temperatures descend a lot, and the hills become covered in mist, but the warmth is in the homes of the families gathered together to celebrate the festivities of the end of the year.
The members of the group are hard-working people, they are always prepared to do whatever possible to improve their quality of life, and of their families. Miguel Ángel, one of the members, is known for his good humor and his kindness. He is 27 years old, single, and lives with his mother, who depends on him economically. To cover household expenses, for 10 years he has made a living selling blue barrels (tambos), which he buys in the state of Querétaro (4 hours away from where he lives) in a soap factory. These barrels are part of the materials that are no longer used in the factory, and he gets them at a lower price. 
To sell this recycling material, Miguel travels to the state of Michoacán, also 4 hours away from his home, where he stays three or four days a week. When he has sold almost all of his merchandise, he returns to the industrial area to buy more barrels and keep offering variety. Miguel began this occupation because he worked for two years with a man who did the same work. He realized it was a good business, and decided to do it on his own. He was able to do it thanks to a first loan from VisionFund, which made it easy for him to buy the first barrels. Now, every time he finishes paying back a loan, he asks for a new one. In this case he will buy more water deposit tanks, and make some repairs to the pickup truck he uses for transfers. 
Miguel’s biggest desire is to expand his business and be able to offer employment to other young people in his community, in the same way that he started. 
The other members of the group are Tania, who will invest in pottery; Ma. Guadalupe, in her beauty shop; Anahi, in her stationery store; Beatriz, selling dairy products; Blanca, in her milling business; and Guadalupe, selling perfumes. 
*The photograph was taken in the garden of the municipality, the members of the group were very excited because it was the first time they had traveled to the center, usually they made all the procedures in their community.

loans.use: to buy water deposit tanks (tinacos).

loans.name: Ana Marleny

texts.es:
La señora  Ana  de 42 años de edad, tiene casa propia vive la ciudad de Nacaome, se dedica desde hace 13 años a su negocio que es una pulpería sus clientes son todos los amigos y vecinos. 
Doña  Ana  es una mujer  trabajadora con muchos deseos de salir adelante esta solicitando su tercer préstamo a Prisma para la compra de arroz, azúcar, café, pan, harina, huevos, aceite, agua, refrescos, etc. y así poder surtir mas sus pulpería.
Doña  Ana  esta contenta por que gracias a préstamos anteriores ha podido salir adelante y  su negocio ha mejorado. 
Su sueño es que en su próximo crédito  mejorar mas su negocio y su vivienda.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Madam Ana is 42 years old. She has her own house and lives in the city of Nacaome. She is making a living for 13 years now with her own business, which is a small grocery store. Her clients are all friends and neighbours.
Madam Ana is a hardworking woman with a lot of desire to get ahead. She is requesting her third loan with Prisma to buy rice, sugar, coffee, bread, flour, eggs, oil, water, sodas etc. and in this manner be able to better stock up her grocery store.
Madam Ana is content as, because of the previous loans, she has been able to get ahead and her business has improved.
Her dream is to further improve her business and her house with the next loan.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - December 2014.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, coffee, bread, flour, eggs, oil, water, sodas etc. for her business

loans.name: Alcida

texts.es:
La señora Alcida de 44 años de edad es casada, tiene 04 hijos  que dependen de ella, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 20 años  a la venta de ropa usada y costura de prendas de vestir.
Doña Alcida su actividad la realiza en su casa de habitación y también la venta de ropa la realiza de forma ambulante, es una mujer luchadora con deseos de salir adelante, solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de sandalias, blusas, vestidos, faldas, pantalones, camisas, etc. Y espera que para esta temporada navideña pueda obtener buenas ganancias que le permitan salir adelante con su familia.
Uno de sus su sueños es mejorar su casa y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Mrs. Alcida is 44 years old, is married, and has 4 children who depend on her. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. She has her own house, and has been dedicated to selling used clothing and to sewing garments for 20 years.

Alcida does her work in her home, and she also sells clothing from door-to-door. She is a determined woman, with dreams of going forward. She is requesting a loan to buy sandals, blouses, dresses, skirts, pants, shirts, etc. She hopes that for the Christmas season she can obtain good earnings that will allow her to go forward with her family.

One of her dreams is to improve her house and her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – December 2014.

loans.use: to buy sandals, blouses, dresses, skirts, pants, shirts, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Krestellyn

texts.en:
Krestellyn is 29 years old with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, eggs, etc.

Krestellyn has borrowed and repaid 18 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 8 years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Janette

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Janette works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Janette is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Janette has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Juan Guillermo

texts.es:
Con su gran empuje y perseverancia, Juan ha salido adelante y ha podido educar y sostener a su familia conformada por su hijo.
Siempre ha buscado la manera de obtener ingresos para su familia, tanto así que ha pasado por numerosos trabajos en el municipio de Bello.
Hoy en día, después de haber decidido por su independencia, trabaja en la fabricación de casas para mascotas, artículos y objetos artesanales en tela.
Por esta y muchas más razones solicita un préstamo para compra materia prima como tela e insumos como agujas y pegas.
Con este préstamo podrá asegurar la sostenibilidad de su negocio y por ende de su familia.
Si prestas a este crédito estarás aportando al progreso y empuje Colombiano!
texts.en:
With his great drive and perseverance, Juan has suceeded and been able to educate and sustain his family, which consists of his son.

He has always looked for a way to obtain an income for his family, so that he has done numerous jobs in the town of Bello. Today, after having decided to work independently, he works making pet houses and other items and artisan objects in cloth. For this and many other reasons he is asking for a loan to buy raw materials like cloth and supplies like needles and glue.

With this loan he will be able to assure the sustainability of his business and ultimately of his family. If you contribute to this loan you will be supporting Columbian progress and enterprise!

loans.use: to buy raw materials like cloth and supplies like needles and glue.

loans.name: Juan Angel

texts.es: Don Juan, tiene 48 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 3 hijos y reside en una aldea del municipio de Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. El siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura y albañilería y hace un año que decidió con su esposa establecer su propio negocio de una pulpería. Vende productos de la canasta básica como arroz, frijoles, harina, café, manteca, pan, huevos, churros, condimentos y productos de aseo. Su esposa vende comidas los fines de semana donde obtiene otros ingresos. Ha decidido obtener un préstamo por 5,000 Lempiras para poder mejorar su negocio surtiendo de granos básicos, azúcar, café, pan, churros y otros para aumentar las ventas. Su plan es crecer con el negocio, darles estudio a sus hijos y que se ayuden con el negocio.
texts.en:
Juan is 48 years old, and he is married with three children. He lives in a town in the municipality of Quimistán, Santa Bárbara. He has always worked in agriculture and masonry. One year ago, he and his wife decided to establish their own business, a small grocery store.

He sells basic goods such as rice, beans, flour, coffee, butter, bread, eggs, churros, condiments and cleaning products. His wife sells food on weekends, earning more income. 

He has decided to request a loan for 5,000 lempiras in order to improve his business, stocking basic grains, sugar, coffee, bread, churros and other products to increase his sales. His plan is to grow his business, have his children study, and then they may help him with the business.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, sugar, coffee, bread, churros, and others to increase his sales.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria makes a living through her retailing business, she operates a sari-sari store and runs a lumberyard in Lopez Jaena. She earns a promising income to support her family.

Maria signed up for her membership with PMPC to gain access to capitalization and insurance. She wants to increase her inventory. Now, she is taking a loan to purchase more lumber to sell. Maria hopes, with the support of her husband, to sustain her business and dreams of providing her family with a better life.

loans.use: to purchase more lumber to sell

loans.name: Nilo Amador

texts.es:
Nilo tiene 51 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, comercio, transporte y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, cuenta con una mototaxi propia con la cual brinda este servicio, cuenta con 06 años de experiencia en el rubro y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a realizar labores agrícolas como peón. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiendo a su unidad móvil ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorada. Con esto Nilo podrá brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá aumentar su nivel de ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Nilo is 51 years old and lives with his common law wife and their two children in the District of Pucara, located in Jaen province, Cajamarca region, in northern Peru. The province's principal activities are agriculture, commerce, transport, and cattle raising.

Nilo offers public transportation, using his own moto-taxi for this service. He has six years of experience in this business, and very good personal and work references in the zone. In addition, Nilo works as an agricultural day laborer.

The loan will be used to make repairs and carry out maintenance on his moto-taxi which is presently  deteriorated. With these repairs accomplished, Nilo can offer his customers better service, and that will allow him to improve his income level and, consequently, advance the entire family's quality of life.

loans.use: make repairs and perform maintenance on his moto-taxi because, at present, it is quite deteriorated.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy una particular vendedora de cominos y especies que desarrollo su negocio gracias a la ayuda de un familiar quien le mostro este mundo y a ella le termino gustando y hoy en día a sus 52 años de edad representa toda su entrada de dinero. 
Es separa por lo que depende única y exclusivamente de lo que le de este negocio y pensando en mejorarlo solicita un crédito para la compra de plástico que es donde lo empaca, cominos, clavos, canela y demás especias usadas en cocina.
texts.en:
Nancy sells cumin and other spices. She developed her business thanks to the help of a relative who showed her this world, and she ended up liking it. Today, she is 52 years old, and this work is the way she makes money.

She is separated and thus depends only on this business. She is planning to improve the business by requesting a loan so that she can buy plastic in which she packs cumin, cloves, cinnamon, and other spices used for cooking.

loans.use: invest in plastic in which she can pack cumin, cloves, cinnamon, and other spices she sells.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Ivan es un hombre de 49 años de edad, soltero y vive solo. 
Actualmente se gana la vida con la venta de mercancía por como ropa, calzado y accesorios; esta actividad la inició gracias al apoyo de un familiar, con este negocio ha logrado obtener ingresos para apoyar su sustento. 

Es una persona emprendedora y luchadora, con ganas de salir adelante para seguir con su negocio. 

Este crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar desea invertirlo en la compra de surtido de mercancía (ropa, perfumería, accesorios, lencería) con el fin de tener la oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas ofreciendo mayor variedad de productos que satisfagan los diversos gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes. 

Su principal sueño es tener gran cantidad de surtido y ampliar la cartera con los clientes buenos y aumentar sus ventas, así podrá tener un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Ivan is a 49 year old man, he is single and lives alone.  He is currently earning a living selling merchandise like clothing, shoes and accessories; he started this activity with the support from his family and 
has been able to make profits and earn a living.  

He is an entrepreneurial and hardworking person, willing to get ahead to continue with his business.  

This loan requested with Corporacion Interactuar will be invested in buying merchandise (clothing, perfumes, accessories and lingerie) to have the opportunity to increase sales by offering a wider variety of products that satisfy the different tastes of his customers.  

His main dream is to have more stock and expand his client base to increase sales and well-being.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing, perfumes, accessories and lingerie)

loans.name: Norelia Esther

texts.es:
El deseo de comprar una vivienda propia impulso a  la joven Morelia a montar su propio negocio de confección, y sería la primera en su barrio con este negocio, donde aparte de la confección a terceros que será su actividad principal, ofertara servicios de sastre para que ayudara mucho a sus vecinos.
Solicita un crédito para comprar la herramienta necesaria para iniciar su negocio, iniciara con una maquina fileteadora y recubridora y espera en el transcurso de año poder tener un flujo de clientes que la ocupen a diario entre 10 y 12 horas.
texts.en:
The desire to buy her own home prompted the young woman Morelia to start her own sewing business. She is the first person in her neighborhood with this business, where she separates the sewing into thirds. This will be her primary work. She will offer tailoring services to help many of her neighbors. 

She requests a loan to buy the tools she needs to begin her business. She will begin with a sewing machine and a covering machine, and she hopes that over the course of the year she will be able to have a steady flow of clients that will occupy her daily for between 10 and 12 hours.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to begin her business.

loans.name: Marco Fidel

texts.es:
Marco es un hombre soltero de 37 años de edad, acostumbrado al trabajo, es una persona responsable que trata de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. 
Un proyecto acerco a Marco a las instalaciones de Interactuar y es que desea iniciar una empresa de venta de comida, un proyecto que no solo será para el sino para los 5 empleados que necesitara para su negocio. 
Con el monto solicitado comprara maquinaria, activos, silletería, mesas, cubiertos, ollas, freidora, tostadora, casi todo lo de cocina y si le sobra algún capital invertirá en la compra de insumos, el monto es justificado con todos los implementos que necesita comprar por ello necesita de tu apoyo no solo Marco si no los 5 empleados que con ansias esperan la apertura de su negocio de venta de alimentos.
texts.en:
Marco, 37 years old, is a single man used to work. He is a responsible person looking to improve his living conditions.

Marco approached the Interactuar facilities with a project in mind. He wants to start a food sales business, a project that will involve him plus five employees that he will need to run the business.

With this loan he will buy machines, equipment, seats, tables, cutlery, pots, a deep fryer, a toaster, just about everything for the kitchen, and if he has any capital left, he will invest in the purchase of supplies. 

The loan amount is justified given all the implements that must be purchased.

Your support is needed not only by Marco but also the five employees who eagerly await the opening of Marco's business.

loans.use: to start his food sales business which will give employment to five people. He will buy machines, equipment and supplies.

loans.name: Cruz Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Cruz del Carmen de 45  años de edad es  Soltera, tiene 01 hijo que depende de ella, vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras no tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 07 años  a la venta de abarrotería como ser: granos básicos, jugos, carnes, embutidos, detergentes, harinas, dulces, etc.
Doña Cruz es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante y para esta época de navidad desea mejorar sus ventas y es por eso que solicita un préstamo para la compra de frijoles, azúcar, arroz, café, huevos, pan, etc. 
Doña Cruz espera que esta inversión le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia y aprovechar la temporada navideña para vender mucho.

San Lorenzo, Honduras -  Diciembre del 2014.
texts.en:
Mrs. Cruz del Carmen is 45 years old, is single, and has 1 son who depends on her. She lives in a community in the Southern part of Honduras. She doesn’t have her own house, and for 7 years, she has sold groceries, including basic grains, juices, meat, cold cuts, detergents, flour, sweets, etc.
