Brenda oferta productos de higiene así como detergentes y productos de limpieza, estos productos mantienen demandas y son los que le han ayudado a obtener buenos ingresos y ganancias a su negocio. Brenda solicita el crédito para aumentar su inventario para la compra de jabones, detergentes, desinfectantes entre otros que le ayudaran a incrementar sus ventas así como sus ganancias. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento que le ayudara a mejorar su calidad de vida la de ella y su familia. Brenda recomienda a las personas que siempre que se tracen una meta sean responsables y acepten los retos; que aunque será difícil, se puede, asegura que "aquel que tiene el deseo de progresar lo puede lograr".
texts.en:
Starting at four in the morning, Brenda gets up to prepare all her products and arrive early in the same place that she has conducted her business from where she provides for her three daughters’s education, food, and home. Brenda says that the most important thing for a person who wants to get ahead is to have the desire to be somebody. She sets and example for her daughters to work hard and be someone in life. While Brenda sells her product in the market, her older daughters sell in the streets near the municipal market. 

Brenda supplies personal care products, detergents, and cleaning products. These products are in high demand and helped her to get good profits and an income from her business. Brenda is requesting a loan to increase her inventory purchasing soaps, detergents, disinfectants, and others that will help her increase her sales and her profits. She relies on this funding that will help improve the quality of life of Brenda and her family. 

Brenda advises people to always go for their goals, be responsible, and accept challenges. Although it will be difficult, you can do it. She says that “he who has the desire to progress can achieve it.”

loans.use: to purchase soaps, detergents, and other hygiene products to sell

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is age 53. She is living with her six children and husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her husband has been selling fruits for many years. He uses a four-wheel manual cart for selling and, as a hawker, he can easily reach near to the people. The people like to buy fruit at their doors instead of moving to the market. 

Due to his fruit's freshness, he has attained a regular list of customers and he makes enough money to contribute to the family's income. Due to his reputation, the demand for fruits has increased and, around noon, his stock comes to an end.

Shazia feels proud of her husband and appreciates his efforts for his family. She is receiving this loan for her husband, so he can buy seasonal fruits in greater quantity and an equilibrium scale to weigh them. 

Shazia wants to save the excess profit, so that she can utilize these savings for future, sudden needs and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy seasonal, fresh fruits and a scale for her husband's business.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Doña Sofía, tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos y vive sola con una hija menor en un sector de Cofradía, Cortes, Municipio de San Pedro Sula. Doña Sofía siempre a buscado ingresos para mantener a sus hijos y comenzó vendiendo mercadería, como ropa y artículos. Y hace 5 años ella decidió establecer una pequeña pulpería para vender granos básicos, azúcar, churros, pan, leche, huevos, manteca, productos de aseo etc. para obtener otros ingresos. Ha mantenido el negocio mediante la reinversión de las ganancias de su negocio. Actualmente solicita un financiamiento por 10,000 lempiras, para comprar arroz, azúcar, frijoles, pan, leche, embutidos y carne de pollo para surtir más y continuar las ventas. Su meta es crecer con el negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Sofía is 51 years old. She is a single mother of 4 children and lives alone with a young daughter in the sector of Cofradía, Cortes, in the municipality of San Pedro Sula. Sofía has always worked for an income to support her children. She began selling merchandise such as clothing and personal products. Five years ago, she decided to establish a small grocery store to sell basic staple products, sugar, churros, bread, milk, eggs, butter, toiletries, etc. for more income. She has kept her business by reinvesting her profits in the business.

She is currently seeking a loan of 10,000 Lempiras [$475] to buy rice, sugar, beans, bread, milk, sausages, and chicken to continue to stock her store and get more sales. Her goals is to grow the business as it is her main source of income.

loans.use: to stock her store with rice, sugar, beans, and more

loans.name: Amjad

texts.en:
Muhammad Amjad runs a Hardware Shop in Karachi. He is 48, married, and the father of three children. His children are going to school. 

Muhammad Amiad is gaining more experience with time and has improved his business a lot. He is organized and disciplined. He purchases the hardware items for his shop from the local wholesale market and then resells it at his shop. 

Though his business is doing well, he is not self-sufficient yet. He has requested a loan to get more established and improve his living standards.

This loan will help him boost his business and increase his market outreach. Muhammad Amjad is very thankful to Kiva and Brac Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase hardware items for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets, wood, and nails so that he can replace the roof of his house.

loans.name: Anselma

texts.es:
Anselma tiene 52 años de edad, es casada, sin hijos a su cargo, vive con su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Anselma se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, con más de 15 años de experiencia en el negocio, el cual está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Anselma solicita préstamo para mejoramiento de infraestructura donde se encuentran sus animales(corrales), dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones a sus animales, con gran influencia en el negocio; Anselma piensa mejorar productividad de los animales para poder atender las diversas necesidades y gustos de los clientes de la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Anselma is 52 years old, married, and has no children under her care. She lives with her family in a rural area of the District of Oyotún in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. Her community is known for agriculture, livestock breeding, and trade.

Anselma raises and sells animals. She has more than 15 years of experience in this business, which she is located at her home. Anselma is requesting a loan so that she can improve the infrastructure of the pens where her animals are kept. This investment will help provide better conditions for her animals, which will have a great impact on her business. Anselma intends to improve the productivity of her animals so that she can meet the diverse needs and tastes of her customers in the area. In the short term she will be able to increase her earnings, improve her income, and eventually improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to pay for improvements to her animal pens.

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is 40 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Melanie has been in this business for 18 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

She aspires to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Generosa

texts.en: Generosa is married and works hard to support her family by running a food-vending business in the Philippines. She also earns additional income by running a general store.  Generosa has requested a loan for PHP 24,000 from NWTF to buy ingredients for her food business. She has sustained her business with hard work and 25 prior loans from NWTF and Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-making business.

loans.name: Enelda

texts.es: Doña Enelda, tiene 57 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con tres hijos en su casa en  una aldea del municipio de Nueva, Frontera, Santa Bárbara. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles de donde a obtenido ingresos para su familia. Y hace 15 años decidió por cultivar café también ya que se vende a buen precio. Esta producción la vende en pastilla o grano en la misma comunidad. Solicita el segundo ciclo a la institución que es por 10,000 Lempiras para comprar abonos y fertilizantes y darle mantenimiento a dos manzanas de cultivo de café. Tiene como plan mejorar el cultivo y seguir incrementando sus utilidades.
texts.en: Enelda is 57 years old, a single mother who lives with her three children in a house in Nueva Frontera municipality, Santa Barbara. She has always farmed corn and beans, and used the income to support her family. 15 years ago she decided to grow coffee also as it can be sold at a good price. This production is sold by the seed or grain in her community. She seeks a second loan cycle from the institution for 10,000 Lempiras to buy manure and fertilizers and provide maintenance to two blocks of coffee crops. She has plans to improve her crops and continue increasing her skills.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers and provide maintenance to two blocks of coffee crops.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is 59 and a mother of eight children living in the populated area of Lahore. 

Shamim is an entrepreneur and carries out embroidery work at her house. She is hardworking and experienced. She makes intricate designs and patterns. Her work is appreciated by everyone. Shamim now has many students who learn embroidery from her. 

In order to grow her business and complete some orders, Shamim needs to buy raw materials for embroidery but her expenses don't allow her to save and buy the necessary raw materials. This is why Shamim has requested a loan to buy the raw materials. She is hopeful that it will be fruitful. 

Shamim's dream is to open up her own embroidery shop in the market.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for her embroidery work.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es:
Carmela de 52 años de edad, está casada y tiene 5 hijos de 34. 32, 29, 24, y 19 años de edad, solo uno de ellos todavía vive con ella y trabaja en una peluquería, ella estudió hasta 4° grado de educación básica, su esposo es agricultor  y solo él y su hijo viven con ella. Carmela es comerciante tiene una tienda desde hace 6 años, aprendió trabajando en el chalet de la escuela de la comunidad, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00 am a 7:00 pm, en ocasiones le ayuda una vecina.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar granos básicos, aceite, detergentes, carnes y pollo que son los productos que más le compran. Su proyección más grande es crecer en el negocio y ofrecer a sus clientes ropa y cosméticos.
texts.en:
Carmela is 52 years old, married, with 5 children ages 34, 32, 29, 24, and 19. Only one of the children still lives with her and works in a barber shop. She completed a 4th grade education, her husband is a farmer and he and her son live with her. Carmela is a vendor and has had a store for 6 years. She learned this work working in a community school store. She works from 8 AM to 7 PM, and at times the neighbor helps her.

She seeks a loan to buy basic grains, oils, detergents, meats, and chicken which are the products most purchased. Her future projections are to grow the business and offer her customers clothing and cosmetic.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oils, detergents, meats, and chicken.

loans.name: Ocampo Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ocampo Poty está en su ciclo número 4° Del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y con ello poder trabajar por mejorar sus vidas.
Carmen es miembro de este grupo, ella tiene una despensa bien surtida, trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, y hasta muy noche. Es una persona muy sacrificada que quiere crecer y poder dar nuevos trabajos a otras personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtir su negocio con bebidas, lácteos, verduras y demás, y con ello poder seguir dando a sus clientes todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
The group Ocampo Poty is in its 4th loan cycle of the committee of women program, where they all work and help one another to move forward. They are doing a poverty elimination survey, and with it they are able to work to improve their lives.

Carmen is a member of this group. She has a well stocked store, where she works everyday from very early in the morning until very late at night. She is a very selfless person who wants to grow and to be able to give new jobs to other people.

She is asking for this loan in order to be able to stock her business with drinks, dairy, vegetables, and other products. With this she will be able to continue giving customers everything that they need.

loans.use: to buy drinks, dairy, vegetables, and other products to stock her store.

loans.name: Luisa Fernanda

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Bello desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Luisa y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Luisa desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos utensilios de cocina y compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Luisa is a humble and hardworking woman that has dedicated a great part of her life to taking care of her children.  She lives in the municipality of Bello where her performance in the kitchen is spectacular.  Her business is to cater food such as tamales, chorizo sausages, empanadas, arepas and other.   

Her food is sold mainly to neighbors of the area who know Luisa's “touch” and know that they can get delicious and well prepared food.  

Luisa wants to expand her food sales and wants to work more comfortably, this is why she requests a loan to buy a number of kitchen tools and ingredients to continue making her recipes, she will buy chicken, flour, cheese and other.  

This loan will allow her to get her business ahead and obtain the necessary income that gives her the opportunity to continue supporting her family with this loan from Corporacion Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy a number of kitchen tools and ingredients to continue making her recipes, she will buy chicken, flour, cheese and other.

loans.name: Haydee De La  Paz

texts.es:
Haydee de 55 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada y tiene 2 hijos de 32 y 31 años de edad, su hijo y su padre trabajan en el taller de estructuras metálicas que es propio y su hija le apoya en los oficios del hogar, además con ella vive una nuera. Haydee es comerciante, administra una tienda, tomo la decisión de iniciar este negocio por iniciativa propia, además prepara los almuerzos de los docentes de una escuela cercana a su casa, su horario de trabajo es de 6:30 am a 8:30 pm y le apoya su hija.

Solicita el préstamo  para comprar jabón, papel higiénico, bebidas, golosinas, pastas y demás para abastecer su tienda, de manera que espera algún día poder vender también granos básicos y otros productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Haydee is 55 year old, completed high school, is married with two children ages 32 and 31. Her son and her father work in their own metallic structure workshop and her daughter helps her with the household chores. In addition a niece lives with her. Haydee is a vendor and has a store. She made the decision to start this business by her own initiative. In addition she prepares lunches for the teachers in a school near her home. She works from 6:30 AM until 8:30 PM and her daughter helps her.

She seeks a loan to buy soap, toilet paper, beverages, candy, pasta and other items to stock her store. In this way she hopes one day to be able to also sell basic grains and other products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy soap, toilet paper, beverages, candy, pasta and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the fees of a Masters degree.

loans.name: Estrellas De Fatima Group

texts.es: Hermelinda de 50 años es casada con 02 hijos independientes. Ella  pertenece al grupo  “Estrellas De Fátima” conformada por 07 socias emprendedoras. Hermelinda  se dedica a la venta de bebidas como agua de meza. Hace más de 02 años que viene desempeñándose  en dicho negocio lo cual le va bien. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de agua san mateo, san Luis y cielo. El deseo de Hermelinda es  crecer en su negocio llegando a más clientes.  El grupo “Estrellas De Fátima” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda facilitada. Hermelinda es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo negro.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is 50 years old and is married with two children who are independent. She belongs to the group "Estrellas De Fátima" consisting of 7 entrepreneurial members. Hermelinda makes a living selling drinks such as bottled water. For more than 2 years, she has been working in the said business which is going well for her. It's for this reason that she asked for a loan to buy San Mateo, San Luis, and Cielo water. Hermelinda's wish is to grow her business by reaching out to more customers. 

The group "Estrellas De Fátima" appreciates the Kiva lenders for the assistance provided. Hermelinda is the second from the left-hand side and is wearing a black t-shirt.

loans.use: to buy bottled water such as San Mateo, San Luis, and Cielo.

loans.name: Zafar

texts.en: Zafar, 45, is married and the father of five children. He owns a furniture shop and is known for being hardworking and honest. He earns a living by making furniture, including single and double beds, sofas, chairs, tables, dining sets, etc. in modern and traditional designs that his customers appreciate. Zafar's business is increasing day by day, so he wants to buy wood to make more furniture.  Due to insufficient financing, he has requested a loan to make the purchase possible. This loan will help him boost his business and increase his market outreach. He thanks Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for their assistance.

loans.use: to buy wood for making furniture.

loans.name: Misael De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Misael es un hombre luchador y responsable  vive junto a su esposa en una comunidad muy productiva al sur de nuestro país.
Don Misael su negocio es la compra y venta de cerdos esto lo hace desde su casa de habitación y muchas veces se traslada a distintas comunidades cercanas a la suya venderlos esto con la ayuda de su esposa. 
Don Misael con el préstamo espera comprar más cerdos  para engordarlos y así venderlos a mejor precio para obtener mejores ganancias con las ventas y así brindarles una mejor atención a sus clientes.
Don Misael en un futuro espera que su negocio sea uno de los más reconocidos de la zona.

Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre 2014
texts.en: Misael is a fighter and a responsible man, who lives along with his wife in a very productive community in the southern part of our country. Misael's business is to buy and sell pigs from his home. Many times he travels to the nearby communities to sell them, with the help of his wife. With this loan, Misael wants to buy more pigs to fatten them up and sell them for a better price, thus making better profits with this sale and bringing better service to his clients. In the future, Misael would like for his business to be one of the best recognized in the area.  Choluteca, Honduras November 2014

loans.use: To purchase pigs for his business.

loans.name: José Mercedes

texts.es: Don Mercedes es un microempresario emprendedor que tiene la edad de 57 años, casado, propietario de un taller de muebles en su domicilio desde hace treinta años anteriormente era trabajador y conforme ahorró compró las maquinarias para impulsar su propio negocio, cuenta con la ayuda de dos trabajadores que son remunerados y solicita por primera vez el financiamiento para su negocio en ADIM, para la compra de maderas, selladores, laka, juncos, clavos, pega blanca, cener, etc., una de sus metas es seguir aumentando la producción y así seguir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Don Mercedes is an enterprising small entrepreneur. He is 57 years old, married, and the owner of a furniture workshop in his home that he has operated for the past 30 years. Mercedes previous worked as an employee, but he used his savings to purchase the machines for starting his own business. He has the help of two salaried workers.

Don Mercedes is requesting his first loan from ADIM for his business. He will purchase wood, sealants, reeds, nails, white glue, paint thinner, and other supplies. One of his goals is to continue increasing his production so that he can improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood, sealants, reeds, nails, white glue, paint thinner, and other supplies so that he can offer a quality product.

loans.name: Ignacia

texts.es:
La señora Ignacia  es una mujer muy responsable vive con su esposo e hijo en una comunidad de la zona al sur de Honduras.
Doña Ignacia su negocio es la elaboración y venta de tortillas es muy conocida por los trabajadores de las distintas camaroneras de la zona y personas vecinas de su comunidad.
Doña Ignacia con el préstamo espera comprar maíz, cal y  leña  para poder elaborar sus productos  y así satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes ya que tiene mucha demanda de su parte.
Doña Ignacia espera poder ver el crecimiento de su negocio con las ganancias obtenidas también desea mejorar su vivienda y así poder darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. 


Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre 2014
texts.en:
Ignacia is a very responsible woman, she lives with her husband and child in an area in the south of Honduras.

Ignacia's business is making and selling tortillas. She is well-known by the workers of the various shrimp boats in the zone and neighbors in her community.

With the loan, Ignacia hopes to purchase corn, lime powder and firewood to be able to make her products and to satisfy her customers' needs since there is a lot of demand on their part.

Ignacia hopes to be able to see growth of her business with the earnings she gets, she also hopes to improve her house to be able to have a better quality of life for her child. 

Choluteca, Honduras – November 2014

loans.use: to purchase corn, lime powder, and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.es: Rosemary, tiene la edad  de 35  años, está casada, vive con sus hijos y esposo, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de equipoy herramientas para la preparación de madera para hacer muebles, la cual le facilitará la elaboración de madera y así poder aumentar la cantidad de muebles realizados y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido en capacitaciones y poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de madera y otras productos, y  también lograr un mejor acabado a los muebles fabricados, además de aumentar la cantidad y calidad de piezas. Con esta compra pretende hacer más nubles y con diseños más variados y así cumplir con los pedidos a corto plazo. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ell no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rosemary is 35 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children who are her greatest priority. With this loan she intends to buy equipment and tools for preparing wood used to make furniture. This will help to facilitate furniture production so that she can increase the quantity of items that she produces. She will also make use of the knowledge that she has gained from her training so that she can have income for investing in the purchase of wood and other products. Rosemary will also be able to achieve better finishes on the furniture that she produces, as well as increase the quantity and quality of the various pieces.

With this loan, she intends to make more furniture in a variety of designs so that she can complete her orders in the short-term. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. Rosemary has not received any other loans from the state banks. FUDECOSUR is offering this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy wood to make more furniture to sell

loans.name: Carla Vanessa

texts.es: El diseño es lo que le ha llamado la atención a Raúl, el hijo de Carla Vanessa, quien desde pequeño, cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de sus padres. El sueño de ser productor visual de video y foto está a punto de ser realidad, su mama quiere que también ese sueño se haga realidad es por esa razón que solicito un préstamo para pagar los módulos de finalización de estudios de su hijo. Con el título en mano Raúl podrá conseguir un trabajo y desempeñarse de manera eficiente con todo lo que ha estudiado. Sus planes futuros son tener su propio estudio visual y lograr contribuir con el desarrollo de su país.
texts.en:
Raúl, the son of Carla Vanessa, has been interested in design since he was a little boy.  He has the unconditional support from his mother and father.  His dream of being a visual producer for video and photography is about to become a reality.

His mother also wants that dream to come true, so she requested a loan to pay the fees associated with her son finishing his degree.  With his degree in hand, Raúl will be able to get a job and efficiently work with everything he has studied.

His plans for the future are to have his own visual studio and to be able to contribute to his country's development.

loans.use: to pay the costs associated with her son finishing his degree

loans.name: Ethel

texts.en:
Ethel is a woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ethel is 41 years old and has one child in school.

Ethel has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Ethel requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Ethel has been in this business for two years. In the future, Ethel would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Ezra

texts.en:
Ezra is 52 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Ezra is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Ezra has been in this business for two years and also earns additional income from vegetable vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.
